T02TD2098E:95a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti t'i k'a s'a ra no pi ka n'a ma /
T02TD2098E:95a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2098E:95a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2098E:95a-5: gzugs sogs dbang po'i yul las 'das pa yi //
T02TD2098E:95a-6: rnam dag 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku //
T02TD2098E:95a-7: dbang po'i gzhu 'dras sa lam rab grol zhing //
T02TD2098E:95a-8: gzhon nu'i 'o mas bu ltar gso mdzad lha //
T02TD2098E:95a-9: dam pa'i skyes mchog nges ston mdzad pa yi //
T02TD2098E:95a-10: zhabs kyi mtsho skyes gnas der sbyis btud nas ;
T02TD2098E:95a-11: / tshig rgyas pa yi las rab bsdus pa'i don //
T02TD2098E:95a-12: dpag med 'byung gnas thabs mang ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:95a-13: blo ni rmongs 'gyur rig pa'i gnas med kyang //
T02TD2098E:95a-14: rje btsun drin gyis rgyud rnams kun gyi bcud //
T02TD2098E:95a-15: rtogs shing gsung rab la sogs gzhung gzhan yang //
T02TD2098E:95a-16: mthong bas snying po'i mngon rtogs bshad par bya //
T02TD2098E:95a-17: rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i //
T02TD2098E:95a-19: thig le bzhir 'gyur dgur bcas pa //
T02TD2098E:95a-20: mda' gnyis rab tu phye ba la //
T02TD2098E:95a-21: rim gnyis rab tu sbyor ba ste //
T02TD2098E:95a-22: rgyud kyi rgyud nyid bshad kyis nyon //
T02TD2098E:95a-23: de la rgyud 'di ni rin po che lta bu yin te /
T02TD2098E:95a-24: dbang po bzhi dang shin tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:95a-25: la la dag ni bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:95a-28: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kho na'o zhes zer te //
T02TD2098E:95a-29: de dag ni snying po la spyod pa'i gang zag ma yin no //
T02TD2098E:95a-31: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad kyis dben zhing brtags pa'i rtog pa gang gis kyang ma gos par gcig pas du ma mi gnas kyis kyang gdul bya'i blo'i khyad par gyis du mar snang zhing rang rang gi rtog pa la bden par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:95a-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'ga' zhig tu //
T02TD2098E:95a-34: yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs par//
T02TD2098E:95a-35: chos kyi char gyis tshim mdzad pa //
T02TD2098E:95a-36: sems can gzhug pa'i ched du gnas //
T02TD2098E:95a-38: de bas na kho bo ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni gtso bor ston to //
T02TD2098E:95a-39: gzhan gyi rig pa ma yin pa'ang //
T02TD2098E:95a-40: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T02TD2098E:95a-41: gtso bos theg dbye ma mchis kyang//
T02TD2098E:95b-0: @95b gang gis theg pa gsum bstan pa //
T02TD2098E:95b-1: nga ni thabs la mkhas pa'i dngos //
T02TD2098E:95b-3: dman pa dang 'bring dang rab kyi khyad par gyis nyan thos dang /
T02TD2098E:95b-5: theg pa chen po bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2098E:95b-6: rgyud du ston pa nyid du yang rigs te /
T02TD2098E:95b-7: sngon du byung bas yang rgyud gcig nyid la du mar gzhag pa nyid de /
T02TD2098E:95b-8: de ltar yang rgyud gcig nyid la du mar go ba'o //
T02TD2098E:95b-9: de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i gur las /
T02TD2098E:95b-10: skyes bu bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:95b-11: rnal 'byor pha yi rgyud bshad do //
T02TD2098E:95b-12: btsun mo bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:95b-13: rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do //
T02TD2098E:95b-14: dman pa las ni las kyi rgyud //
T02TD2098E:95b-15: las kyi rnal 'byor de ltag la //
T02TD2098E:95b-16: sems can mchog la lhag rnal 'byor //
T02TD2098E:95b-17: bla med rnal 'byor de ltag la //
T02TD2098E:95b-19: rten la sogs pa'i khyad par du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:95b-20: gling gzhi bstan pa nyid kyis chog pa ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:95b-22: dbang po rab dang yang rab tu gyur ba la /
T02TD2098E:95b-23: ae wam ma ya shru ta sa ma ya ae ka / zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis snying po la 'gro ba brtson par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:95b-24: thams cad kyang ldan pa yin te //
T02TD2098E:95b-25: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //
T02TD2098E:95b-26: bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi //
T02TD2098E:95b-27: kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni //
T02TD2098E:95b-28: yi ge gnyis su yang dag bstan //
T02TD2098E:95b-29: yi ge ae ni mar gyur la //
T02TD2098E:95b-30: wam ni pha zhes bya bar grags //
T02TD2098E:95b-31: thig le de gnyis sbyor ba ste //
T02TD2098E:95b-32: sbyor de shin tu rmad du 'byung //
T02TD2098E:95b-34: thams cad du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:95b-35: thabs dang shes rab 'dus byas pa'i sbyor ba las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gsung sar gyur to //
T02TD2098E:95b-36: de bas na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis sbyor ba ni ma ning ste /
T02TD2098E:95b-37: de 'jug pa'i khyad par gcig pu pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po brjod pa ni nges pa ste /
T02TD2098E:95b-39: gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa ste //
T02TD2098E:95b-40: kun du 'gro ba shin tu phra //
T02TD2098E:95b-42: gzhung gzhan gyis kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:95b-43: de ltar don gyi rang bzhin gtan la bab nas //
T02TD2098E:95b-44: tshig gi tshogs blo la rab tu sbyor ba'i dgos pas don bsdus nas bstan par bya ste //
T02TD2098E:95b-45: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2098E:95b-47: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa //
T02TD2098E:96a-0: zhes bya ba'i par gyis thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor bstan @96a * //
T02TD2098E:96a-2: / khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02TD2098E:96a-4: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD2098E:96a-5: zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi 'khor bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2098E:96a-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis mchod par brjod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-10: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //
T02TD2098E:96a-12: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzad //
T02TD2098E:96a-13: ces pa'i bar gyis bdag gi don du gsol ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-14: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
T02TD2098E:96a-16: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don du gsol ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2098E:96a-19: dbang po'i bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
T02TD2098E:96a-20: zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
T02TD2098E:96a-23: glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol //
T02TD2098E:96a-24: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yang dag pa'i mtshan gyi don gsol ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-25: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
T02TD2098E:96a-27: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
T02TD2098E:96a-28: zhes pa'i bar gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i don gyi gsol ba'o//
T02TD2098E:96a-29: de dag ni gleng gzhi'i don gleng bslang ba dang 'brel bar bstan pa ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:96a-30: gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
T02TD2098E:96a-32: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug / ces pa rgyud nyan pa la gus pa'i sbyor ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-33: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub ;
T02TD2098E:96a-35: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
T02TD2098E:96a-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis ljags byin gyis brlabs pa bdud mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-37: tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis //
T02TD2098E:96a-39: legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2098E:96a-40: zhes pa'i bar gyis changs pa'i gsung gi 'khor la ched du brjod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-41: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
T02TD2098E:96a-43: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
T02TD2098E:96a-44: zhes pa'i bar gyis nyan pa po thos pa dang sbyar bar bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96a-45: rkang pa ya gcig gis mtshams sbyar bar bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-0: 'di dag ni sbyor ba phun @96b sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:96b-1: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02TD2098E:96b-3: chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
T02TD2098E:96b-4: zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs la gzigs pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-5: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
T02TD2098E:96b-7: sde tshan bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i mthas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin bstan cing bshad do //
T02TD2098E:96b-10: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD2098E:96b-11: ces pa'i bar gyis chos thams cad yi ge gcig gi lus la gnas par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-12: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD2098E:96b-14: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02TD2098E:96b-15: ces pa'i bar gyis nyon mongs pa dang rigs rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-16: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2098E:96b-19: zhes pa'i bar gyis khams dang che ba bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-20: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo che //
T02TD2098E:96b-22: bsam pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
T02TD2098E:96b-23: zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam shes tshogs dang lha mo'i rnam dag bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-24: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02TD2098E:96b-26: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis sa dang bskal bzang bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-27: de dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam dag de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:96b-28: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2098E:96b-30: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can /
T02TD2098E:96b-31: zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-32: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02TD2098E:96b-34: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
T02TD2098E:96b-35: zhes pa'i bar gyis lam gyi yon tan rdzogs par bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-36: thog ma med pa spos med bdag / ces pa nas /
T02TD2098E:96b-37: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
T02TD2098E:96b-38: zhes pa'i bar gyis thugs kyi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-39: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
T02TD2098E:96b-41: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che //
T02TD2098E:96b-42: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsung gi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:96b-43: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi bdag / ces pa nas //
T02TD2098E:96b-44: tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-3: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
T02TD2098E:97a-4: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba'i 'dren ston du gyur pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-5: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
T02TD2098E:97a-7: bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis theg pa gsum gyi lus ye shes su bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-10: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-11: chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal //
T02TD2098E:97a-13: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag / ces pa'i bar gyis de thams cad rnal 'byor gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-14: so so rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2098E:97a-16: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis rang rig tu gzhi gcig par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-17: shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //
T02TD2098E:97a-19: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2098E:97a-20: zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid la rnyog pa bcus ma gos par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-21: sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD2098E:97a-23: drang srong che dgus mchod cing rjed //
T02TD2098E:97a-24: ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i 'khor lo bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-27: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
T02TD2098E:97a-28: zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-29: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02TD2098E:97a-31: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02TD2098E:97a-32: zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs kyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-35: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-36: yang dag bdag med la sogs pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyis don gyi rgyud la bstod pa bston to //
T02TD2098E:97a-37: stong nyid smra ba'i khyung mchog ste //
T02TD2098E:97a-39: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
T02TD2098E:97a-40: zhes pa'i par gyis tshig gi rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-41: mi gnas pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis rab tu byed pa'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97a-42: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
T02TD2098E:97a-44: gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po //
T02TD2098E:97a-45: zhes pa'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-0: mtshungs @97b pa med cing che bar grags //
T02TD2098E:97b-2: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog / ces pa'i bar gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-3: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / ces pa nas /
T02TD2098E:97b-4: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02TD2098E:97b-5: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan to ;
T02TD2098E:97b-6: /'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02TD2098E:97b-8: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //
T02TD2098E:97b-9: ces pa'i bar gyis thabs kyi rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-10: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
T02TD2098E:97b-12: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin //
T02TD2098E:97b-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis thabs ye shes sems dpa'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-14: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
T02TD2098E:97b-16: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
T02TD2098E:97b-17: ces pa'i bar gyis dri ma rnam par dag pa'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-18: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
T02TD2098E:97b-20: lus kun las ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD2098E:97b-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis bya ba dang bral ba'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-22: nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa //
T02TD2098E:97b-24: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
T02TD2098E:97b-25: zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-28: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2098E:97b-29: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang don bkra shis rgyud las skye bar bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-30: mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal //
T02TD2098E:97b-32: 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyi mchog / ces bya ba'i bar gyis rang bzhin brtags pas dben pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-33: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
T02TD2098E:97b-35: / gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
T02TD2098E:97b-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mar dge ba phyag rgya chen por bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-37: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
T02TD2098E:97b-39: dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
T02TD2098E:97b-40: zhes pa'i bar gyis bar du dge ba chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-41: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma//
T02TD2098E:97b-43: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
T02TD2098E:97b-44: zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mar dge ba las kyi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD2098E:97b-45: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
T02TD2098E:97b-47: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2098E:97b-48: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i lus lhan cig skyes pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-3: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
T02TD2098E:98a-4: ces bya ba'i bar gyis tshig la mi gnas pa'i tshig gi gnas su bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-5: kun du dga' ba mchog tu dga' //
T02TD2098E:98a-8: zhes pa'i bar gyis sku dang ye shes la sogs pa'i snang ba san to //
T02TD2098E:98a-9: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
T02TD2098E:98a-11: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
T02TD2098E:98a-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba la sman par snang ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-13: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog //
T02TD2098E:98a-15: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
T02TD2098E:98a-16: zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan du snang ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-17: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
T02TD2098E:98a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces pa'i bar gyis rim pa gnyis su snang ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-20: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02TD2098E:98a-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
T02TD2098E:98a-23: zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs su snang ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-24: rdo rje'i nyi ma nas rkang pa gnyis kyis bklag pa'i thabs dang mi gnas pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-25: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02TD2098E:98a-27: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / ces pa'i bar gyis lam gyi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-28: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gtsod //
T02TD2098E:98a-30: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-31: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
T02TD2098E:98a-34: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsang don lhun gyis grub pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-35: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / ces pa nas ;
T02TD2098E:98a-36: / ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02TD2098E:98a-37: zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-38: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02TD2098E:98a-40: sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
T02TD2098E:98a-41: ces pa'i bar gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mdor bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-42: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
T02TD2098E:98a-44: tshangs pa'i g-yul sa rtse nas gnon //
T02TD2098E:98a-45: zhes pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98a-46: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
T02TD2098E:98a-48: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
T02TD2098E:98a-49: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpe don gyi 'brel ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-0: sen mo'i @98b 'od ni shes cher dmar //
T02TD2098E:98b-2: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud dang ldan //
T02TD2098E:98b-3: zhes pa'i bar gyis mtshan dpe bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-4: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
T02TD2098E:98b-6: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
T02TD2098E:98b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi lam rdzogs par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-8: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
T02TD2098E:98b-10: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
T02TD2098E:98b-11: zhes ba'i bar gyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-12: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
T02TD2098E:98b-14: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02TD2098E:98b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis skad cig gyi ye shes bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-16: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces pa nas /
T02TD2098E:98b-17: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
T02TD2098E:98b-18: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsang sngags mtha'i don du bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-19: nyon mongs pa la sogs ba rkang ba gnyis kyis 'khor ba'i sa bon dang bral bar bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-20: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
T02TD2098E:98b-22: nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2098E:98b-23: zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan don mdzad pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-24: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo //
T02TD2098E:98b-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
T02TD2098E:98b-27: zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid kyi 'thad pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-28: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog / ces pa nas //
T02TD2098E:98b-29: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes gyi lus kyi mdzad pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-30: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mdor bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-31: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
T02TD2098E:98b-33: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
T02TD2098E:98b-34: zhes pa'i bar gyis yi ge thams cad tshogs gcig pa'i stong par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-35: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02TD2098E:98b-37: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02TD2098E:98b-38: zhes pa'i bar gyis ae wam gyis dbugs dbyung ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-39: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02TD2098E:98b-41: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02TD2098E:98b-42: ces pa'i bar gyis sku gsum du bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-43: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02TD2098E:98b-45: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
T02TD2098E:98b-46: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba gsum gyi gtso bor snang ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:98b-47: ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla //
T02TD2098E:98b-49: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
T02TD2098E:99a-1: gyis bdud pham par byed pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-4: phyag byar 'os pa bra ma'i rab //
T02TD2098E:99a-5: ces pa'i bar gyis bsnyen bkur gyi gnas su bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-6: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
T02TD2098E:99a-8: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa mnga' bar bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-9: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02TD2098E:99a-11: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis 'jug bsdu ba bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-12: de dag gis ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snang ba ye shes lngar bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99a-13: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2098E:99a-15: yi ge re re zhing chos kyi dbyings la gos pa la bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-16: rigs kyi bdag po nas bzung ste /
T02TD2098E:99a-18: bzhi ba'i bar gis ye shes sdags kyi rang bzhin du bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-19: rigs kyi bdag po nas bcu drug pa'i bar gyis de yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan te /
T02TD2098E:99a-20: de dag ni don gyi snying po yon tan bsdus pa'i don gyi bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99a-21: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2098E:99a-23: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas ;
T02TD2098E:99a-24: / zhes pa'i bar gyis 'khor gyi mchod pa brjod par bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-25: de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag / ces pa nas //
T02TD2098E:99a-26: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02TD2098E:99a-27: ces pa'i bar gyis ched du brjod pa'i bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2098E:99a-28: de dag ni ye shes kyi rjes su mthun pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99a-29: mched nas rjod pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ni sgo lnga'i khyad par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:99a-30: de ltar bsdus pa'i don yongs su shes shing /
T02TD2098E:99a-31: don lhag par rnyed pa'i gang zag gis rgyud kyi rab tu byed pa'i don 'di nyid kyang bde blag tu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:99a-32: da ni tshig gi don gsal bar dbya bar bya ste //
T02TD2098E:99a-33: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ;
T02TD2098E:99a-34: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mtshon pa la gang nas she na /
T02TD2098E:99a-35: mantra'i rang bzhin shes shing skyob pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99a-36: des spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2098E:99b-0: gdul dka' ba ni theg pa @99b gsum ste /
T02TD2098E:99b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor los skyar ba dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams so //
T02TD2098E:99b-4: kyi zhes pa ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-5: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa ni theg pa'i yang rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2098E:99b-8: gnyis su med pas na mchog go //
T02TD2098E:99b-9: dpa' bo ni 'jigs shing thub pa med pa ste sku dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-10: gsung dang thugs kyi khyad par gyis sa 'og dang sa steng dang //
T02TD2098E:99b-12: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid bde pa chen po'i snying po can te /
T02TD2098E:99b-13: gang la yong ba ni dbang phyug go //
T02TD2098E:99b-14: de lnga'i gsang ba las thob pa ni rgyal po'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-15: padma dkar po ni dkar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ste //
T02TD2098E:99b-16: 'dir rnam par rtog pa bzhi pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-17: ye shes la ched du brjod pa ni rang las te /
T02TD2098E:99b-18: 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i don gyis na yang zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2098E:99b-20: ao ga spru ser la brdzes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-22: lce 'dril zhing ya sos ma mchu mnan pa dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-25: yan lag rab tu bgrad pa dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-26: nyid lag rdo rje rtse mo lta bu dang /
T02TD2098E:99b-28: gdug pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
T02TD2098E:99b-31: me 'bar ba'i gnas ni rim par ldan pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:99b-32: lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs par mtha' yas pa la yod pa ni ma rig pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis zad pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:99b-33: de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung nas 'phro ba yang rdo rje rtse mo'i gzugs so //
T02TD2098E:99b-34: rang gi lag gis gsor bar byed pa ni snga ma bzhin te //
T02TD2098E:99b-35: de'i don kyang snying chen po dang shes rab dang zhes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-36: thabs ni sngon rang gi don du gyur pa ji ltar de nyid kyis gzhan don du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-37: de ltar sprul pa dang yang sprul gyi gzugs thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chad gi rang bzhin lus ngag yid gsum gyis mchod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:99b-38: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can no //
T02TD2098E:99b-39: khro bo ba'i zhig mi rigs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:99b-40: sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can gyi mgon du gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:99b-41: de dang lhan cig pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2098E:99b-42: thams cad bsam pa mthun par zhes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de @100a * //
T02TD2098E:100a-1: bzhin nyid snang ba med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pas so //
T02TD2098E:100a-2: shes rab kyis bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02TD2098E:100a-3: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas mi gnas pa brnyes pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:100a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa zhe ba'i sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' la yang gsungs shing bshad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:100a-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan ni bde ba chen po thob pa 'ba' zhig la'o //
T02TD2098E:100a-6: khyab bdag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2098E:100a-7: yang nas sems can thams cad kyi snying por gnas pa dang /
T02TD2098E:100a-8: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa pa dang /
T02TD2098E:100a-9: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang b'ai byed pa'i byed pa po nyid kyis 'gro ba bzhi'i dbang po la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2098E:100a-10: bdag ni bdag nyid kho na'o //
T02TD2098E:100a-12: don dang spongs pa'i gzungs kyis so //
T02TD2098E:100a-13: bdag don ni mthar thug pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:100a-15: thabs khyad par can gyi sgyu ma dang 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bu ste /
T02TD2098E:100a-16: nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sbyor bar bde ba chen po'i dra bas kun la g-yogs par bya ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar ro //
T02TD2098E:100a-18: nan tan du bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2098E:100a-19: theg pa chen por 'gyur ba nyin yin te /
T02TD2098E:100a-20: dper na sa bon gyi ma gtogs par myu gu la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byin par ga la nus /
T02TD2098E:100a-22: ma rdzogs rdzogs byed mda' yin no //
T02TD2098E:100a-24: rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi thabs kyi sbyor ba la yang bkag na /
T02TD2098E:100a-25: phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD2098E:100a-26: dang por nang gi bdag nyid la bzhag cing sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:100a-27: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2098E:100a-28: rgyal bas kyang ni ma gsungs na //
T02TD2098E:100a-29: bdag 'dra ngan pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD2098E:100a-30: de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang //
T02TD2098E:100a-31: zhes gsungs pa'i don kyang de'o //
T02TD2098E:100a-32: rgyu 'bras rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:100a-33: byams pa dang snying rje sngon du song ba'i byang chub kyi sems smon pa dang 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2098E:100a-34: shin tu 'jug pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir nang du gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100a-35: de bas na rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis /
T02TD2098E:100b-0: gang gang blo ni bsgoms @100b pa dang ;
T02TD2098E:100b-1: / bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2098E:100b-2: bde gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can //
T02TD2098E:100b-3: zhes pas kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-4: nyon mongs pa ni thams cad rang bzhin dngos po dang /
T02TD2098E:100b-6: btang snyoms kyi rnyog bas sems dkrugs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-7: mi shes pa ni brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang bral bas don ma phrad de smig rgyu la chur bzung bas ngal zhing gdungs pa bzhin /
T02TD2098E:100b-8: 'dir yang brtags pa'i rnyog pa'i 'dam du bying bar gyur pa rnams so //
T02TD2098E:100b-9: sman pa ni gzhan shes rab gsum la sbyar ro //
T02TD2098E:100b-10: nang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa'i dgos pas na phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:100b-11: bla ni 'bras bu ster ba'i don gyis so //
T02TD2098E:100b-12: ston pa ni log rtog bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-13: dam tshig ni sdom pa ste /
T02TD2098E:100b-14: bde ba dang stong pa'i dra ba phyed pa de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-15: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni /
T02TD2098E:100b-16: ae wam las ni rab tu zhugs //
T02TD2098E:100b-18: dbang po gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-19: bsam pa ni gdul bya'i 'dod pa mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-20: de dag ni gnas su gyur pas mchog go //
T02TD2098E:100b-21: gis ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-22: ye shes sku ni ye shes phung po can te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis rtag pa nyid rtag tu 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-24: gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong //
T02TD2098E:100b-25: gang gis ngal sgrar shes pa //
T02TD2098E:100b-26: log par rtog pa spang ba ste //
T02TD2098E:100b-27: skye bo de yis nga mi mthong //
T02TD2098E:100b-28: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD2098E:100b-29: 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni //
T02TD2098E:100b-30: de ni rnam par shes mi nus //
T02TD2098E:100b-32: gtsug tor ni bltar mi mngon pa ste //
T02TD2098E:100b-33: de nyid zil gyis mi non pa'i rtags yin pas na gtsug tor chen po'o ;
T02TD2098E:100b-34: / tshig gi rjod par byed pa ste /
T02TD2098E:100b-35: mi zad pa'i gsung mnga' bas bdag po'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-36: ye shes ni mtha' dang bral ba ste mi 'gyur bas na sku'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-37: de'i mtshan nyid ni rang 'byung ba ste /
T02TD2098E:100b-38: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan gyi don brjod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-40: don zab pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:100b-41: don rgya che ba ni blo'i yul ma yin pas so //
T02TD2098E:100b-42: don chen po ni rang gzhan grub pas so //
T02TD2098E:100b-43: mtshungs pa med pa ni gcig pur gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:100b-44: zhi ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas so //
T02TD2098E:100b-45: dge ba gsum ni skye ba dang //
T02TD2098E:100b-48: yang na lus dang ngag dang /
T02TD2098E:100b-49: yid gsum las 'byung ba gsum mo //
T02TD2098E:101a-1: na dus gsum du gsungs pa dang //
T02TD2098E:101a-2: gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-3: de nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes par sgrub par byed par yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-4: rgyud ni tshig dang don to //
T02TD2098E:101a-5: rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:101a-6: de rab tu rgyas par gsal bar byed pas tshig la yang ngo //
T02TD2098E:101a-7: thabs kyi rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba mtshon pas btags ba ste /
T02TD2098E:101a-8: lha sbyin zhang po can zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-9: las ni skal ba'i rgyud de gong du bstan zin to //
T02TD2098E:101a-10: rdo rje 'chang chen ni grags chen la //
T02TD2098E:101a-11: gsang sngags 'chang ni snying po don gyi sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2098E:101a-12: ji snyed pa ni dpag med rnams kyis so //
T02TD2098E:101a-13: dgyes bzhin du glur blangs pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:101a-14: gsang 'dzin ni rgyud 'di nyid sngar bshad pa'i don yang ngo //
T02TD2098E:101a-15: phyir ni gtso bor gyur pa gzhan med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-16: nges pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02TD2098E:101a-17: der ma byung gi bar la 'byung gi bar zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-18: gzung ba ni bdag don du'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-19: gsang ba spang ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:101a-20: bsam pa'i khyad par ni dbang po'i bye brag la'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-21: bshad par 'tshal ba ni de kho na nyid bcu dang /
T02TD2098E:101a-22: rim pa gnyis dang zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-23: gsang dbang ni dug bcom pa'i de nyid la dbang ba'i lag na rdo rjes so //
T02TD2098E:101a-24: de skad du zhes pa ni lnga'i gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD2098E:101a-25: spyod lam ni gus pa'i rtags so //
T02TD2098E:101a-26: de nas de ma thag tu'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-27: rigs dang stobs mtshon pas sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-28: rkang gnyis ni lha dang mi'i ste /
T02TD2098E:101a-31: kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs ba'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-32: ring zhing yangs pa ni chu dang zheng ngo //
T02TD2098E:101a-35: 'dzum pa bstan pa'i bdud btul ba dang /
T02TD2098E:101a-36: 'khor bag dang ldan pa la dgod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:101a-37: thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi yid dang mthun par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-38: tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa ste //
T02TD2098E:101a-40: che ba dang gsal ba dang /
T02TD2098E:101a-41: don go bar nus par 'dus pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-43: gsang ba ni gsang ba chen po la'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-44: slar gsungs pa ni zhus pa'i lan no //
T02TD2098E:101a-45: snying rje chen po ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101a-46: dag par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dag par byed pa ste /
T02TD2098E:101b-1: / sdig sel ba ni rdul dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-2: brtson pa ni ma yengs par rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-3: rang don nyid kyis legs so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-4: gnyis pas gzhan don gzung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-5: legs par bstan pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lam du'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-7: rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin du blta ba dang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin bo ches brtan pa ltar blta ba dang /
T02TD2098E:101b-8: thun mong gi 'khor rin po che lta bu'i gang zag tu blta ba dang /
T02TD2098E:101b-9: bshad bya sems kyi rang bzhin shes rab dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed par blta ba dang /
T02TD2098E:101b-10: gsung dri ma med pa'i bdud rtsis dbang po tshim zhing khyab par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:101b-11: gsang sngags ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu lha'i 'khor lo ste /
T02TD2098E:101b-14: rig sngags rnams la thams cad ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-15: de dag ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo gzung ngo //
T02TD2098E:101b-16: de nyid kyi rigs shes par yang bya'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-17: rigs chen ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin lnga pa dang drug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-18: kho bo ni rigs 'pho bar 'dod pa ste /
T02TD2098E:101b-19: dam pa'i zhal las 'ongs pa ni rgyas gdab gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te mdor bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-20: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02TD2098E:101b-21: zhes pa ni gsang sngags la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi las byed cing /
T02TD2098E:101b-22: don bsgrubs na 'chang ba ste las kyi rigs so //
T02TD2098E:101b-23: yang na thams cad shes rab kyi rtags su shes par byas la /
T02TD2098E:101b-24: des de la nan tan du byas pas de 'grub ces pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rigs gsum ste /
T02TD2098E:101b-26: la ni de nyid gzhir byas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02TD2098E:101b-28: zhes bya ba la rnam par gzigs ba ni sku'o //
T02TD2098E:101b-29: 'jig rten ni log pa'i shes pas brtags pa'i 'khor ba ste /
T02TD2098E:101b-30: de nyid rang gi ngo bo rnam par dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la /
T02TD2098E:101b-31: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mgos pas na padma'i rigs so //
T02TD2098E:101b-33: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching //
T02TD2098E:101b-34: rang rang nyid ni rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD2098E:101b-36: 'jig rten gzugs la sogs pa ste //
T02TD2098E:101b-37: snang ba'i dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-0: de'i byed pa po ni mnyam pa nyid @102a * //
T02TD2098E:102a-2: rin po che'i rigs la phyogs med pas na chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-3: phyag rgyan ni khyab cing mi 'da' ba'i don gyis te /
T02TD2098E:102a-6: rigs lnga dbyer mi phyed pas rtsod 'das kyi rigs so //
T02TD2098E:102a-7: rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:102a-8: rigs bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams la zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched yod pa dang rang nyid kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skye mched kyi 'khor rnams rigs drug gi rgyud du mkhyen pas gtsug tor cher gzigs nas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-9: gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug la dgongs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102a-10: 'bras bu kho na lam du bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:102a-11: rigs drug gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:102a-12: tshig ces pa ni tshig gi rgyud do //
T02TD2098E:102a-13: bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste rdo rje 'chad do //
T02TD2098E:102a-14: tshigs su bcad pa ni rkyang ba bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-15: bka' stsal pa shugs kyis shes par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:102a-16: longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang /
T02TD2098E:102a-19: gsang sngags ni skye ba med pa'i snying po can yi ge aa'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-20: rgyal po ni thams cad kyi bdag bor gyur bas so //
T02TD2098E:102a-21: drug ni sde tshan shes rab kyi yi ge'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-22: ldan pa ni sde tshan bdun pa'i thabs kyi yi ge'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-23: de mtshon byed du gyur cing //
T02TD2098E:102a-24: thun mong dang mchog gi nus pa 'byung zhing shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-25: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
T02TD2098E:102a-26: zhes bya ba ni ma ning yi ge'i rang bzhin mtshon bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-27: mi skye ba ni ngo bo ste chos so //
T02TD2098E:102a-28: chos ni rkyen las skyes pa ste chos can no //
T02TD2098E:102a-29: can ni tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-30: de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa ji ltar gnas she na /
T02TD2098E:102a-31: ring thung gi bye brag gis rigs dang rigs kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:102a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102a-33: mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'khor lor snang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:102a-34: sna tshogs dkar dmar gyi rnam par snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:102a-35: de nyid rnam par dag pa dang rnam pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ai a'i zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102a-36: rin po che'i rigs ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102b-0: thun mong ma @102b yin pa'i dbang po'i longs spyod du gyur pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-1: thun mong gi dbang po'i sbyod yul du gyur pa ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:102b-2: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas mtha' bzhi la mi gnas pa ni aoo aoo zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102b-3: padma'i rigs ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102b-4: khro ba dang mnyam pa dang zhi ba'i khyad par gyi rigs bsdus rgyas bye brag tu snang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-5: rnam shes skye ba'i sgo tha dad par snang ba ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:102b-6: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyud gcig tu gnas pa au a'u zhes bya'o ;
T02TD2098E:102b-7: / las kyi rigs ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102b-8: thogs pa med pa'i skus rigs so so'i phrin las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-9: dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid rang dang mthun pa'i don byed /
T02TD2098E:102b-10: gdul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:102b-11: rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas 'bad pa med par rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba ni aam a'o //
T02TD2098E:102b-12: rdo rje'i rigs chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102b-13: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-14: sgro skur dang bral ba nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang gang zag gi khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:102b-15: rang gi ngo bos ni gcig la rtag tu 'byung ba dang rjes 'jog tu gnas pas rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-16: rnam par dag pas 'di'i zhes 'ga' la yang mi gnas pa'i ae aee zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te /
T02TD2098E:102b-18: gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-20: yul la mi gnas pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-22: phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad de'i ngo bor gcig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-23: zug rdu gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i ye shes snang ba med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i lus brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2098E:102b-24: mtshan ma thams cad rang grol bas dbang po rang bzhi zhing ming gis dben pa'i zung 'jug rgyud las skyes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:102b-25: rigs thams cad ye shes thams cad nyid yin pas rtsod 'das zhes bya ste /
T02TD2098E:102b-26: dbye ba med pa la aa a'a zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:102b-27: de rtogs par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo'i khyad par nang rten cing 'brel te 'byung bas 'jug pa ste /
T02TD2098E:102b-28: sthi to hr'i de zhes bya ba ni re zhig pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2098E:103a-2: dzny'a na zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02TD2098E:103a-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gnas de dag tu rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-5: m'urti zhes bya ba ni spyi gcug la bya ste /
T02TD2098E:103a-6: phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor bas lam nges par sbyangs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gyis shigs pa med pa'i yi ge ham las byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa 'dren cing rol pas de brnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-7: ra ga ra ste chags pa chen po'i sbyor bas 'og nas 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i ye shes de nyid ham ngo //
T02TD2098E:103a-8: ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba ni ra ste rdo rje dang padma'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-9: de yang ye shes kyi byed pa po dang phrad ba las byang chub kyi sems gnyis ni aa dang buddho'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-10: de nyid nang gi 'jug pa'i rim pas rtogs par gyur pa ni buddha n'am no //
T02TD2098E:103a-11: dga' ba gsum lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2098E:103a-12: lhan cig skyes pa dus gsum du 'byung ba ni t+ya dhva brti n'i'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-13: man ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-14: ji ltar nyams su blang ba yang dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shes blo'i yul ring du gyur ba ni badzra ta'i kshna'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-15: de ltar yang sdug bsngal gcod par nus pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:103a-16: dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la btud pa'i drin gyis /
T02TD2098E:103a-17: skad cig la rnyed par gyur pas du: kha tstshe da'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-19: kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de //
T02TD2098E:103a-20: gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal las dris //
T02TD2098E:103a-22: des gnang bar gyur pa'i rim pa ni pradzny'a dzny'a na'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-23: m'urti ni rgyun te bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2098E:103a-24: ya ni ya te gnas pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:103a-25: de nyid gnyug ma'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid du byas pa ni dzny'a na ste /
T02TD2098E:103a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje nyid yin par k'a ya w'a ka go //
T02TD2098E:103a-27: yang ni b'a g'i shva ri ni gsung gi dbang phyug gi rgyud pas de nyid shes par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:103a-28: lung dang rang gi rigs pa dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gis zhes gzhan du bstan to //
T02TD2098E:103a-29: aa la sogs pa'i don ni skye ba med pa'i bde ba chen po'i snying po zhes dang /
T02TD2098E:103a-30: mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba'i stobs kyis dam tshig gi spyod pa dang //
T02TD2098E:103a-31: rigs pas thams cad kyang de bzhin du bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2098E:103b-0: de kho na nyid @103b re re dang bral ba dang zhes bya ba'i don la yang mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-1: 'di ltar ni bshad zin pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2098E:103b-2: aa las 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyud don a'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-3: don chen la sogs pa ni don che bas phan yon che ba 'byung bas na skye ba med pa'i snying rje'i snying po can ni yi ge dam pa aa las 'byung ba yin no zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-4: mchog ni mchod pa dang rjed gzhi thams cad kyi srog tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:103b-5: khong nas 'byung bas na srog go //
T02TD2098E:103b-6: de'i phyir skye ba med pa mtshon par nus te /
T02TD2098E:103b-7: dper na srog gi rlung 'gags na thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:103b-8: brjod pa dang bral bas phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba ste /
T02TD2098E:103b-9: brjod pa ni ming yin la de las blo skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:103b-10: thams cad du brjod pa ma bkag pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:103b-12: yan lag gi gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-13: de ltar yi ge gtso bo las mngon par 'phel ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi sa bon dang /
T02TD2098E:103b-14: snying po dang sngags su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-15: gsal yig ma 'phel ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:103b-16: srog tu brjod pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2098E:103b-17: bcu gcig pa'i thig legs thabs kyi rang bzhin gzung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-18: thabs su mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:103b-19: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i gur las /
T02TD2098E:103b-20: bde ba chen po 'khor pa khyab /
T02TD2098E:103b-21: bde ba spangs ni de ma yin //
T02TD2098E:103b-23: thig le spangs pa la rnyed par ma gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:103b-24: bde ba chen po ni shes rab ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:103b-26: bud med bzang mo'i reg bde ba //
T02TD2098E:103b-27: glu thos pa yi zhi ba bde //
T02TD2098E:103b-28: dri bsnams pa yi bde ba che //
T02TD2098E:103b-29: skyes nas reg pa'i bde ba che //
T02TD2098E:103b-30: bcud len rab tu sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2098E:103b-31: bde ba su zhig 'gog par byed //
T02TD2098E:103b-33: shes rab dang thabs tha mi dad pa nyid las dkyil 'khor pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:103b-36: me'i khams rnam par dag pa ni mchod pa chen po ste bde ba'o //
T02TD2098E:103b-37: des rgyu dang 'bras bu'i skabs su sems can thams cad dga' bar byed do //
T02TD2098E:103b-40: chu'i khams rnam par dag pa ni zhe sdang chen po ste mchod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-0: des nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i @104a * //
T02TD2098E:104a-1: nyon mongs pa gcod par byed do //
T02TD2098E:104a-3: sa'i khams rnam par dag pa ni gnyis med de /
T02TD2098E:104a-4: gti mug chen po'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-5: re mi shes shing shes pa med pas na gti mug blo ste ma rig pa'i rtsa ba can gyi gti mug sel to //
T02TD2098E:104a-8: rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa ni 'gro 'ong med pa'i rang grol du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104a-9: phrag dog chen po'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-10: de yang tha mal pa'i phrag dog gcod par byed pas na sgra che ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-12: tshor ba rnam par dag pa'i khams ni blo yis ma spags pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104a-13: chags pa chen po'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-14: des mngon par zhen pa thams cad sel bar byed do //
T02TD2098E:104a-15: de ltar 'khor ba'i rnam par dag pa rigs dang de bzhin gshegs par bstan la /
T02TD2098E:104a-16: de yar ye shes kyis dag par byas la rtsod 'das su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-17: bstan pa la dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:104a-18: phal ba'i rnam par spangs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:104a-19: bsgom par yang dag rab tu grags //
T02TD2098E:104a-20: phal ba'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni //
T02TD2098E:104a-21: bsgom pa de ni sgom pa min //
T02TD2098E:104a-23: 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa las sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:104a-24: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-25: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-26: dga' gral gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD2098E:104a-31: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod //
T02TD2098E:104a-33: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid //
T02TD2098E:104a-34: rnam par nyed pa spyod pa mdzod //
T02TD2098E:104a-35: bdag gis bde ba spyad do zhes //
T02TD2098E:104a-36: mtshan nyid bral la gsum las gzhan //
T02TD2098E:104a-37: chags dang chags med rnam par spangs //
T02TD2098E:104a-38: zhes gsungs pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:104a-39: gzugs chen zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dbang bskur ba'i rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:104a-40: de yang ye shes la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-41: nyon mongs pa la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-44: de yang gzugs lus che ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-45: kha dog dang dbyibs che ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-46: ming dang rgya che ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104a-47: dkyil 'khor che zhing yangs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-0: brda dang @104b nyams su myong ba rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:104b-1: don gcig pa nyid kyis gzugs dang don lus ni snang ba thams cad de chen po ni brdar gyur pa'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du'o //
T02TD2098E:104b-2: kha dog dang lus ni bye brag 'dzin pa'i shes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-3: nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
T02TD2098E:104b-4: cha ba ni mchod pa mchog gi dus su'o //
T02TD2098E:104b-5: snying por gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid rig pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-7: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2098E:104b-8: dag pa gzhan gyis grol mi 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:104b-10: ming dang rgya che ba'i ji srid du ming du btags pa de srid du brtags pa'i rtogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-11: de dag thams cad kyi byed pa po ni rlung lnga'i bdag nyid bcu'i ming can rnam shes kyi bzhon pa ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-12: de yang dag par byed pa ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi padmo las rnyed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104b-13: thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jug pa nyid kyi che ba ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-14: de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa'i chos mtha' dag gi 'obs kyis bskor ba'i nang du dri ma dang bcas pa'i srid pa'i chus bkang ba ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-15: srid pa'i shing spangs shing gtor bas bskyed pa las shin tu ring du skyes nas 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mig dga' ba bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:104b-16: rna bde ba byed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:104b-18: ro zhim pa mkhrang zhing sbom la sna tshogs rnam pa mang bo nyams su myong bar byed cing /
T02TD2098E:104b-19: rgyu gsar du bskyed pa'i sred pa las ldog par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:104b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku bzhi dbyer med 'khor lo ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-21: bde ba chen por gcig pas yangs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:104b-22: de nyid la dngos grub dang bar du gcod pa mi gnas pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:104b-23: dman pa rnams kyis ni lus ngag gi brdas so //
T02TD2098E:104b-24: shes rab mtshon chen po la sogs pas ni chos bshad pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-29: de nyid dgag sgrub dang bral ba dang nyams su myong ba dang /
T02TD2098E:104b-32: de ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rig pas dmu mar bya ste /
T02TD2098E:104b-34: de ni mtshon chen po yin pas / spro btags kun las rnam grol ba //
T02TD2098E:104b-35: de ni dbum pa yis rig //
T02TD2098E:105a-2: blo yis brtags pa thams cad grol ba ye shes kyi rgyud nyid du 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:105a-3: nyon mongs ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:105a-4: rlung gnas su zhugs ba'i man ngag ni lcags kyu chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:105a-5: de yang spyi'i rnam pa las grol ba ste /
T02TD2098E:105a-6: pa'i rnam pa ni slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas //
T02TD2098E:105a-7: 'on kyang sgra las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2098E:105a-8: rnam rtog gzugs brnyan nyid yin no //
T02TD2098E:105a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo dang //
T02TD2098E:105a-12: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can //
T02TD2098E:105a-13: mun pa la ni mar me bzhin //
T02TD2098E:105a-14: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis //
T02TD2098E:105a-15: zhes gsungs ba'i phyir mchog go //
T02TD2098E:105a-16: grags chen ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
T02TD2098E:105a-17: snyan par grags pa ni thabs che ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:105a-18: snang ba chen po ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu ste /
T02TD2098E:105a-19: de nyid rgyu'i dus nyid du rang gi ngo bor gyur pa gsal ba che zhes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:105a-20: tha dad pa ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:105a-21: de yi rang bzhin de yin phyir //
T02TD2098E:105a-22: de yi nus pa de la gnas //
T02TD2098E:105a-23: de phyir de yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:105a-24: lam nyid nas ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2098E:105a-26: mkhas pa la sogs pa phrin las kyi rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:105a-27: de yang rigs mtha' yas pa rigs gcig tu byed pa yang rigs mthun pa gnyen por byed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-28: rigs kyi mtshan ma dngos grub bsgrub pa dang chos thams cad lhan cig skyes par byed pa'i las so //
T02TD2098E:105a-29: de ni rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa gcig pa nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-30: thabs khyad par can nyid dang rjes su mthun pas byin gyis brabs pa nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-31: 'khrul pa zhig pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD2098E:105a-32: de ni dper na chu zla dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-33: dug gis drug gso ba dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-34: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu dang /
T02TD2098E:105a-35: chu rnams rgya mtsho chen por lan tshar ro gcig pa bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:105a-37: mkhas pa rnams ni bde ba chen po ste //
T02TD2098E:105a-38: bden pa gnyis las yongs su grub pas so //
T02TD2098E:105a-39: sgyu 'phrul chen po ni de nyid las rigs snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:105a-40: 'chang ba ni mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2098E:105a-42: gangga'i klung bcu'i bye ma dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD2098E:105b-0: rigs gcig la ni de @105b bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2098E:105b-1: rigs kyi tshogs las rigs ni du ma ste //
T02TD2098E:105b-2: rigs de las ni rigs ni du ma brgya //
T02TD2098E:105b-3: de las yang ni rigs 'bum chen po ste //
T02TD2098E:105b-4: rigs ni sa ya phrag mang po yin pas //
T02TD2098E:105b-5: mi yi rigs ni grangs med de //
T02TD2098E:105b-6: dam pa dga' ba'i rigs las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-8: sgyu 'phrul chen po ni bskyed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-9: de dag gi dgos pa ni kun du brtags par byed pa'i don te /
T02TD2098E:105b-11: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yi ge phyogs //
T02TD2098E:105b-12: gang dang gang gis 'jig rten bcings //
T02TD2098E:105b-13: de dang de ni bcings las grol //
T02TD2098E:105b-15: de nyid rnam spangs grub mi thob //
T02TD2098E:105b-17: mtshan mas mtshan ma 'jig pa mi 'thad pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:105b-19: zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni //
T02TD2098E:105b-20: 'on kyang tha ma la bag chags 'jigs //
T02TD2098E:105b-21: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
T02TD2098E:105b-22: skye bo thams cad 'chi ba ste //
T02TD2098E:105b-23: dug gi de nyid shes de yis /
T02TD2098E:105b-24: dug gis dug ga ni 'joms par byed //
T02TD2098E:105b-25: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:105b-26: de bas na don grub pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-27: dga' ba ni sngar bzhin la /
T02TD2098E:105b-28: de bas dga' ba ni rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-29: de'i dgos pa ni dgos pas gzhan ldog pa dang /
T02TD2098E:105b-30: dngos grub myur du grub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-31: de yang dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por gyur par bsam mo zhes gsungs pa ni 'khor rnams ye shes la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir lus spangs sems spangs kyis /
T02TD2098E:105b-32: bsgrub bya zung 'jug bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu nyid du gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:105b-33: ma nges pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:105b-34: ye shes mngon du gyur pa nyid kyis /
T02TD2098E:105b-35: gtso bos ni bde ba chen po mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-36: sgyu 'phrul chen po ni chos thams cad de /
T02TD2098E:105b-37: de'i mtshan nyid ni mig 'phrul lta bu'o //
T02TD2098E:105b-38: can zhes bya ba ni sems lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gyur pa ni sangs rgyas nyid de //
T02TD2098E:105b-39: 'jig rten khams ni gang nas kyang //
T02TD2098E:105b-40: gzhan du sangs rgyas mi rnyed de //
T02TD2098E:105b-41: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2098E:105b-42: sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med //
T02TD2098E:106a-0: sbyin bdag chen po la sogs pa'i pha @106a * //
T02TD2098E:106a-1: rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-2: sbyin bdag chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-3: tshul khrims chen po la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02TD2098E:106a-4: gtso bo chen po ni bde pa chen po'i nyams myong gis sgeg pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-5: 'chang ba ni brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs kyi phreng ba 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-6: de nyid las mi 'da' ba'i don gyis na mchog go //
T02TD2098E:106a-7: bstan pa ni rang byung gi ye shes kyis rgyud la goms pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-8: brtul ba ni sna tshogs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi bar du goms pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-9: de yang khams gsum sna tshogs pa 'di thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-10: de ltar la lar ni snying rje dang srin po'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2098E:106a-11: la lar ni mi snang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:106a-12: mu cor du smra bar ro //
T02TD2098E:106a-13: la lar ni srid pa dang nor bu bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:106a-14: la lar ni gnyid log pa dang sad cing bsdams par ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:106a-15: ting nge 'dzin gnas ni blos ma bslad pa'i me tog go //
T02TD2098E:106a-16: lus 'chang ba ni dbang po rang snang ba'i 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-17: stobs dang thabs ni ltos pa med par rang nyid gsal ba ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-19: chu bo klung 'bab rgyun dang ni //
T02TD2098E:106a-20: mar me 'bar ba'i rtse mo bzhin //
T02TD2098E:106a-21: sngags kyi de rig rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2098E:106a-22: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan bsgom //
T02TD2098E:106a-24: rgya mtsho ni bdag gzhan gyi dbye ba spangs pa'i ye shes kyi byug pa chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-34: zung du 'jug par yang sbyar ro //
T02TD2098E:106a-35: gnyis ldan pa ni thams cad la khyab par sbyar ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2098E:106a-36: byams chen la sogs pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes su bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-37: phyogs med par snang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:106a-39: mtshan ma'i rlom sems dang bral ba dang /
T02TD2098E:106a-40: 'bad pa la rag ma las par snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-41: de yang byams pa ni byams pa chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-42: de'i rang bzhin dpag tu med pa ste tshad ma bshad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106a-43: snying rje chen po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nyams myong ste /
T02TD2098E:106a-44: blo thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106b-0: @106b shes rab chen po ni mi dmigs pa dang mi gnas pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-1: 'bras bu dang shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106b-2: mkhas pa chen po ni 'khrul ba zhig ba ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-3: rang gi ngang gis 'byung bas na thabs che ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:106b-4: rdzu 'phrul chen po mnyam snyoms pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-5: snang brtags mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:106b-9: de yang rdzu 'phrul chen po ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-10: rgyu rkyen la rag las ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:106b-11: shugs chen zhes bya ba ni the tshom med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-12: gnyug ma'i shes par gyur brtags pa nyid la 'bras bu yang de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:106b-13: bskal pa du ma la rag ma las bsa mgyogs pa chen po tha dad pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:106b-14: nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun par dgos pa las 'dir mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:106b-15: rgyu dang 'bras bur ma grub phyir //
T02TD2098E:106b-16: byang chub med cing bsgom pa med //
T02TD2098E:106b-18: rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dra bas 'dra ba mtshon par nus pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-19: de yang dngos ma yin pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:106b-20: de bas na me long gi nang du byed kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de byed du mi 'gyur pa dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:106b-21: gzhan dag la khyad par ni dpe don de dag yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:106b-22: las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas //
T02TD2098E:106b-23: chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2098E:106b-24: de yi steng du phyag rgya che //
T02TD2098E:106b-27: de lta na ni rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD2098E:106b-28: nyams su myong ba skye mi 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:106b-30: de nyid tshad mar dbye ba yang brgyal dul ba'i sems kyi mtshon cha mngon sum du byas na ni /
T02TD2098E:106b-31: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas sam rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang 'thob la sems can gang gis mtshon bya ji ltar bstan pa bzhin mtshon nam bstan pa tsam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ma rnyed kyi bar du mtho ris dag tu bde blag tu 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na cher grags zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:106b-32: stobs chen po ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-33: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi pha rol gnon pa ste /
T02TD2098E:106b-34: bdag nyid gcig pu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-1: sogs pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-2: sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyu gcig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:107a-3: rtogs shing myong nas rgyud la goms par bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:107a-4: bag chags gcig bcad pas gcod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:107a-5: gnyis su zhen pas gnyis med du rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-6: de yang srid pa ni ma rig pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-7: ri bo chen po ni khams gsum pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-8: 'joms pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dir rig pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-9: mkhregs shing zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2098E:107a-10: rdo rje chen po'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2098E:107a-11: snying po brtan zhing khang stong med //
T02TD2098E:107a-12: mi chod mi phyed mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2098E:107a-13: mi shigs pa ni mi nyams pas //
T02TD2098E:107a-14: stong pa rdo rje zhes bshad do //
T02TD2098E:107a-16: 'chang ba ni bde ba dang tha mi dad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-17: 'bras bu thams cad pa nyid kyi bar du'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-18: drag po chen po ni rnyed par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-19: drag shul che zhes pa ni bag chags thams cad kyi ye shes ngo bor mkhyen nas gnyen po med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-21: bsod nams sdig pa dag dang 'bral med pa //
T02TD2098E:107a-23: 'jigs pa chen po ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-24: de yang 'jigs par byed pa ni dus gsum gyi cha dang bral ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:107a-25: mgon po rigs mchog la sogs pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes su bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-26: rigs gcig tu nan tan bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:107a-27: bla mas bstan pa'i don dang /
T02TD2098E:107a-28: de nyid lam du bya ba dang rang dang gzhan gyi don du phun sum tshogs pa la nan tan du bya / de yang mgon po ni sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2098E:107a-30: chen po ste zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rigs so //
T02TD2098E:107a-31: bla ma gsang sngags ni bla mas bstan pa gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid de /
T02TD2098E:107a-32: chos thams cad la rab tu mi gnas pa'i zung 'jug ni che ba'i mchog go //
T02TD2098E:107a-33: de nyid lam du byed pa ni tshul la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-34: de ji lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2098E:107a-35: rang dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-36: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:107a-37: don mchog ma yin par bstan pa yang /
T02TD2098E:107a-38: gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu gtso bor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107a-39: sangs rgyas la sogs go 'phang gzhan //
T02TD2098E:107b-0: des na don de 'bras bur @107b brjod //
T02TD2098E:107b-2: ma ning gi yi ge ni /
T02TD2098E:107b-3: sdud par byed pa nyid kyis lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2098E:107b-4: ye shes mthar thug pa mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:107b-5: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rgyud nyid du bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2098E:107b-6: sangs rgyas ni spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i dbyings so //
T02TD2098E:107b-7: rnam par snang ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:107b-8: mdzad pa ni sems can gyi don du sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2098E:107b-9: dbyer mi phyed pa ni che ba ste /
T02TD2098E:107b-10: rang bzhin nyid kyis gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02TD2098E:107b-11: thub ba chen po ni yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:107b-12: gang gis mthu dang ldan zhe na /
T02TD2098E:107b-13: thub chen ldan zhes bya ste /
T02TD2098E:107b-14: dus rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas so //
T02TD2098E:107b-15: 'bras bu de dang nye bar gyur pa ni gsang sngags kyi tshul chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:107b-17: phyi rol nang dang gnas 'di kun ;
T02TD2098E:107b-18: / yang dag tu ni rang bzhin med //
T02TD2098E:107b-19: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:107b-20: bral ba'i phyir ni gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD2098E:107b-22: mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba'i gzugs brnyan tsam mam /
T02TD2098E:107b-23: 'di ni gzugs brnyan no zhes brtags pa tsam yang bral ba ni mtha' bzhis dben pa'i dbu ma chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:107b-24: de nyid la yang gsungs pa /
T02TD2098E:107b-25: sna tshogs rtag pa ma yin zhing //
T02TD2098E:107b-26: chad par yang ni khas mi len //
T02TD2098E:107b-27: rtag dang chad pa gnyi ga med //
T02TD2098E:107b-28: gnyi ga yin pa ma yin pa //
T02TD2098E:107b-29: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //
T02TD2098E:107b-30: de ni dbu ma pa yi rigs //
T02TD2098E:107b-32: rig pa rdzas yang dag tu 'dod pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:107b-33: dper na shing sna tshogs pa las me byung ba'i dus na me lce gcig tu gnas so //
T02TD2098E:107b-34: shing zad pa'i dus na me de nyid gnas pa bzhin du ming du btags pa dang blo yis brtags pa sna tshogs pa la skye ba med pa'i me lce gcig tu gyur nas gang gzhan gyi sgro 'dogs zad pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2098E:107b-35: skye ba med pa tsam yang mi gnas pa ste kho bo ni 'dod pas stong pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:107b-36: de yang sems rang gi skal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:107b-37: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD2098E:107b-38: de nas de ltar yang bzhi pa //
T02TD2098E:108a-1: la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:108a-2: dbang bskur bzhi yi grangs kyis ni //
T02TD2098E:108a-3: dga' ba la sogs rim zhes bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-4: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis nang gi bdag nyid can du bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02TD2098E:108a-5: gzhan du rgyas par bstan pas 'dir gya cher ma spros so //
T02TD2098E:108a-6: 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:108a-7: dang por dga' ba tsam nyid de /
T02TD2098E:108a-8: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / dga' bral dga' ba gsum pa ste //
T02TD2098E:108a-9: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa brjod //
T02TD2098E:108a-10: ces gsungs pas gsum pas mtshon pa'i gzhi pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:108a-11: mtshon par byed pa dga' bral ni ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:108a-12: dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i tshul //
T02TD2098E:108a-13: de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD2098E:108a-14: dga' bral dga' ba 'gro ba ste //
T02TD2098E:108a-15: gsum pa lhan cig skyes med do //
T02TD2098E:108a-17: de dag tu ji ltar rim pa'i tshul ni //
T02TD2098E:108a-18: de ltar slob ma'i spyod yul du //
T02TD2098E:108a-19: ro gcig par yang bya ba nyid //
T02TD2098E:108a-20: rang rig ye shes gyur pa ni //
T02TD2098E:108a-21: rang bzhin rig pa spangs pa yin //
T02TD2098E:108a-22: mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa ste //
T02TD2098E:108a-23: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:108a-24: zhi ba'i bde ba rnyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2098E:108a-25: de lta bu'i ye shes brtan par byed pa yang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par gyis /
T02TD2098E:108a-26: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-27: ma byin par yang blang par bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-28: mi tshangs par yang spyad par bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-29: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-31: shes pa'i gnas skabs kyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108a-33: sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni //
T02TD2098E:108a-34: rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2098E:108a-35: bshad gci'i dam tshig mchog gis ni //
T02TD2098E:108a-37: glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis //
T02TD2098E:108a-38: mngon shes lnga yang thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:108a-39: rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis //
T02TD2098E:108a-40: mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:108a-41: khyi sha dag gis dam tshig gis //
T02TD2098E:108a-43: ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis //
T02TD2098E:108a-44: rdo rje dgug pa mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:108a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108a-46: gal te rnyed par dka' ba dang //
T02TD2098E:108a-47: las dang po par gyur pa na //
T02TD2098E:108a-48: sha rnams thams cad med na yang //
T02TD2098E:108b-0: thams cad bsam pa rnam @108b par dag / ces bsam pa'i stobs kyis spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-3: nor la sogs pa bsgrub phyir dang //
T02TD2098E:108b-4: sems can don du de nyid bcas //
T02TD2098E:108b-5: brtul zhugs zhal gyis bzhes pa yin //
T02TD2098E:108b-6: zhes pas drod dang 'brel par spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-8: gang gis shes na ming po ste //
T02TD2098E:108b-9: srid mo yang ni the tshom med //
T02TD2098E:108b-10: ces pas brda dang mtshan mas shes par byas la //
T02TD2098E:108b-11: gnas la sogs pa phyi nang du sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2098E:108b-12: skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-13: de dag thams cad kyi byed pa por gyur pa ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-14: de lta bu'i rgyud sbyang zhing grol bar bya ba ni //
T02TD2098E:108b-15: rim pa gnyis kyi khyad par te //
T02TD2098E:108b-16: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang //
T02TD2098E:108b-17: rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa gnyis //
T02TD2098E:108b-18: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
T02TD2098E:108b-19: rdo rje 'chang gis chos ston to //
T02TD2098E:108b-21: las dang po pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-22: rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya ba ste //
T02TD2098E:108b-24: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2098E:108b-25: dang por re zhig shes byas la //
T02TD2098E:108b-26: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis re zhig pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-27: de dag gis sbyor bar 'gyur ba yang //
T02TD2098E:108b-28: gzugs sogs yul ni gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD2098E:108b-29: rnal 'byor pa la gang snang ba //
T02TD2098E:108b-30: de kun dag pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2098E:108b-31: 'gro ba sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD2098E:108b-32: ces gsungs pa bsgom par bya ba kho na'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-33: gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni dbang po mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:108b-35: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//
T02TD2098E:108b-36: 'bad pa thams cad spang bar bya //
T02TD2098E:108b-38: 'bad pa med pa'i rnal 'byor bsam gtan du bya'o //
T02TD2098E:108b-39: gzhan la ni sems gzhag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:108b-40: rin chen chen po'i kha dog lnga //
T02TD2098E:108b-41: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
T02TD2098E:108b-42: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du /
T02TD2098E:108b-43: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom /
T02TD2098E:108b-46: brtan pa cung zhig thob pa yis //
T02TD2098E:108b-48: thams cad ma skyes zag pa med //
T02TD2098E:108b-49: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med /
T02TD2098E:108b-50: ces gsungs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:109a-1: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2098E:109a-2: mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD2098E:109a-3: gnyis med gnyis su med min bzhin //
T02TD2098E:109a-5: gong du bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rnal 'byor du bya ba'o //
T02TD2098E:109a-6: de yang nang gi spyod pa la mnyam par ma bzhag na /
T02TD2098E:109a-7: ye shes chen po las sems thogs pa med par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:109a-8: yid pham par 'gyur ba'i gnas gsungs pa ni //
T02TD2098E:109a-9: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am //
T02TD2098E:109a-10: rgyal nyid skye zhing zhi ba'i gnas rnams kun //
T02TD2098E:109a-11: bshang gci khu ba sogs pas byugs ba'am //
T02TD2098E:109a-12: rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya //
T02TD2098E:109a-14: dang po pas chad du brjod pa'i gnas bar du gcod pa dang bral ba //
T02TD2098E:109a-15: 'tsho ba rnyed par sla ba rtag tu mchod par bya ba ni //
T02TD2098E:109a-16: bud med sems ni rab brtan pa //
T02TD2098E:109a-17: lo grangs bcu gnyis lo rnyed pa //
T02TD2098E:109a-18: rigs kyi sbyor ba rab bsgoms te //
T02TD2098E:109a-19: bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya //
T02TD2098E:109a-21: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste //
T02TD2098E:109a-22: mkhas pas rang gi khu bdag / rnal 'byor bas ni rtag tu dbyung //
T02TD2098E:109a-25: de la dngos grub tu 'gyur pa ni /
T02TD2098E:109a-26: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD2098E:109a-27: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:109a-29: skye ba med pa'i yi dang la sos pa'i bde bas ni thams cad spyad par bya ba kho na ste /
T02TD2098E:109a-30: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD2098E:109a-31: ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na ni //
T02TD2098E:109a-32: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2098E:109a-33: byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:109a-34: zhes bya ba 'dis ni rten gyi skye 'jig med pa'i rnal 'byor du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:109a-35: gzhan yang rim pa gnyis kyi gnas skabs 'ga' la yang bdag dang gzhan gyi don du dngos grub sgrub pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109a-36: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las sna tshogs pa ni rdzas 'ba' zhig gis 'byung ba dang bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109a-37: sngags dang ldan pas 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109a-38: de yang 'khrul 'khor dang ldan pas 'grub pa ste /
T02TD2098E:109a-40: byang chub med par dge mi 'jug / ces gsungs pas /
T02TD2098E:109b-0: 'gro ba'i don du don chen po la dmigs par bya pa st/ e de las 'byung ba ni @109b 'bras bu'o //
T02TD2098E:109b-1: de ltar gsang sngags kyi tshul chen po'i bdag nyid can ni dman pa'i gang zag gis mi 'grub ste /
T02TD2098E:109b-3: thos pa chung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
T02TD2098E:109b-4: sba ba med par mang du smra //
T02TD2098E:109b-5: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa /
T02TD2098E:109b-6: tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag go //
T02TD2098E:109b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:109b-8: de yang gang la bshad par bya ba ni //
T02TD2098E:109b-9: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skal ldan zhing //
T02TD2098E:109b-10: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD2098E:109b-11: de ni rin chen gang zag ste //
T02TD2098E:109b-12: slob ma la bshad snod yin no //
T02TD2098E:109b-14: de lta bu'i gang zag ni khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:109b-15: mngon par rnyed pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:109b-16: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin thams cad rdzogs par bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2098E:109b-17: bcu ni sbyin pa la sogs pa la bya la //
T02TD2098E:109b-19: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02TD2098E:109b-20: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab thabs //
T02TD2098E:109b-21: stobs dang smon lam ye shes dang //
T02TD2098E:109b-23: ces gsungs pas kho bo sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sdom pa las ma rmongs par bya ba'i phyir rab tu dbye bar byas te /
T02TD2098E:109b-28: dge ba chos sdud pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-29: sems can don byed pa ni tshul khrims so //
T02TD2098E:109b-30: sdug bsngal dang du len pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-31: gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-32: zab mo'i chos la bzod pa'i //
T02TD2098E:109b-34: sbyor ba dang mthar phyin pa ni brtson 'grus so //
T02TD2098E:109b-35: yon tan mong par grub pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-37: sems can gyi don byed pa ni bsam gtan no //
T02TD2098E:109b-38: thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-39: bsgom pa ni shes rab bo //
T02TD2098E:109b-40: rang gi skyon mi sdug pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-41: sems can gyi don byed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-42: myur du byang chub pa ni thabs so //
T02TD2098E:109b-43: rang gi tshogs rgyun du sogs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-44: de sems can gyi don dang 'brel ba dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-45: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa ni smon lam mo //
T02TD2098E:109b-46: las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-47: nyon mongs pa mi sdud pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-48: bdud dang rgol bas mi tshugs pa ni stobs so //
T02TD2098E:109b-49: rtog pa dang mi rtog pa mnyam par 'bigs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:109b-51: thams cad las mi 'da' ba ni ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:110a-1: de thams cad shes rab kyis zin par thugs su chud pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-2: ste zhes pas gzhan sdud pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-3: bcu la gnas pa ni legs par sbyangs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-4: bcu gnas pa zhes bya bar yang sbyar te /
T02TD2098E:110a-5: stong nyid bsgoms pas grol 'gyur gyi //
T02TD2098E:110a-6: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin //
T02TD2098E:110a-7: zhes gsungs pa'i don yin no //
T02TD2098E:110a-8: bcu pa dag ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsod ba ste /
T02TD2098E:110a-9: ldan pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-10: shes bcu ni chos shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-11: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-12: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dan/ g kun rdzob shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-19: rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid ni shes par byas shing /
T02TD2098E:110a-20: de nyid dang bral bas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-21: rnam dag 'chang ba po ni spang bya dang spong byed gnyis gnyis med du gyur ba'i bde ba chen po brnyes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-22: rna pa bcu po ni 'jig rten pa'i lta bar phal cher 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2098E:110a-29: kun nas nyon mongs par 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-30: rnam par byang bar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-32: ma grol ba grol bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-33: don bcu zhes pa ni 'dzin pa bcu rna par dag bas de kho na nyid bcur 'gyur la /
T02TD2098E:110a-34: de nyid ming dang bral bar 'gyur bas don zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2098E:110a-35: de yang rtsa ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-36: mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-37: phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-38: 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-39: rgyu'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-40: rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-41: bsdu pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-42: dbye ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-43: mkhas pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-44: rags pa dang phra ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2098E:110a-45: thub pa'i dbang po'i don ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD2098E:110a-46: stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-47: mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110a-48: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-0: rnam par thar pa @110b pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-1: snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-2: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-3: rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-4: las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ;
T02TD2098E:110b-5: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-6: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-7: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-8: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'gro pa'i don mdzad pas na khyab pa'i stobs kyi bdag ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:110b-9: de dag la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:110b-10: rnam bcu dbang ldan zhes bya ba ni dbang rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:110b-13: yo byad la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-14: mos pa la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-15: smon lam la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-17: skye ba la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-21: / che ba po zhes bya ba ni de ltar theg pa chen po dang /
T02TD2098E:110b-24: sangs rgyas kyi che ba thams cad dang ldan par bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110b-25: thog ma med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byin rlabs kyi rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:110b-26: rgyus stong bas na thog ma med pa'o//
T02TD2098E:110b-27: rkyen dang bral bas na spros med bdag ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:110b-28: de bzhin nyid bdag ni mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes snang ba med pa de nyid do //
T02TD2098E:110b-30: sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag / nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD2098E:110b-31: rna par mi 'gyur snang ba med //
T02TD2098E:110b-33: ces pa gsungs pa nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2098E:110b-34: bden par smra zhes bya ni rten cing 'bral par 'byung ba'i don zab mo dbang po mchog las gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:110b-35: 'di la bsal bar bya ba med //
T02TD2098E:110b-36: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
T02TD2098E:110b-37: yang dag nyid la yang dag pa lta //
T02TD2098E:110b-38: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02TD2098E:110b-39: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110b-40: zhing zhes pa ni gang dang gang 'dul ba la de dang de'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi bsam pa dang rjes su mthun par ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:110b-41: tshig mi 'gyur zhes pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:111a-6: sprul pa lta bur mkhyen cing gzhan la yang ston par mdzad pas /
T02TD2098E:111a-7: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
T02TD2098E:111a-9: de'i rgyus yang dag pa'i mtha' la rnam par gnas shing /
T02TD2098E:111a-10: byin gyi rlabs mnga' yang de nyid kyi mthur rig par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-11: bdag med ces bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba gnyis kyis lta ba gnyis mi gnas pa ste /
T02TD2098E:111a-12: dper na seng ge'i sgras ri dgas la sogs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa ltar /
T02TD2098E:111a-13: bdag med pa'i sgras mu stegs kyi rtag chad gnyis 'jig par byed do //
T02TD2098E:111a-14: kun du 'gro ba ni kun du bzhud pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-16: don yod pa'i stobs kyis bzhud pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-17: thams cad du mi 'byon pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa ni /
T02TD2098E:111a-19: dper na sngon du bgrod pa'i yul yid 'jug pa ltar mgyogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-20: thog ma dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111a-21: rgyal ba ni 'khor ba las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-22: byang chub sems dpa' dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111a-23: bdud bzhi dang nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-24: byang chub sems dpar mdzad pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111a-25: rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bas chos ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-26: 'gal bar dgongs pa stobs po che //
T02TD2098E:111a-28: sprul pa dang rang rgyud kyi khyad par gyis so //
T02TD2098E:111a-29: dgos pa rnam pa gnyis ltar ma yin te /
