T02TD2098E:111a-30: gcig gi rang bzhin gyi nus pas sprul ba yin /
T02TD2098E:111a-31: 'dir rtogs pa dang snying rje dang smon lam mngon du gyur pas snang ba yin no //
T02TD2098E:111a-32: tshogs zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nyon thos kyi dge 'dun de'i slob dpon du gyur pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-33: gnyis pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun te /
T02TD2098E:111a-34: de'i bdag po ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-35: gsum pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun te /
T02TD2098E:111a-36: de'i rje ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-37: bzhi pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:111a-38: de'i bdag po ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2098E:111a-39: de dag thams cad kyi dbang dang ldan pa ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD2098E:111a-40: khyad par bstan pa'i dgos pha ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni gces pa ste /
T02TD2098E:111a-42: 'dir ni gzhung lugs la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-0: rnam rtog @111b mnga' ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111b-1: dper na dpag bsam shing la rnam par rtog pa med kyang 'dod yon mi 'dra bar 'byung ba'i so so'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis so //
T02TD2098E:111b-2: de bzhin du 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' yang /
T02TD2098E:111b-3: sems can gyi bsam pa'i stobs kyis sku sna tshogs su snang bar bgyur ro //
T02TD2098E:111b-4: skyon med pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111b-5: blo chung ba rnams zab mo la 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-10: mi 'jug cing gzhan 'jug tu mi ster bar 'gyur bas bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-12: chung du rnams mi brid pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:111b-13: de nyid tshol ba thog ma yin //
T02TD2098E:111b-14: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //
T02TD2098E:111b-15: don rnams mtshungs shing chags med pa //
T02TD2098E:111b-16: phyis ni rnam par bden don nyid //
T02TD2098E:111b-18: rlom sems dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:111b-19: tshul dang tshul chen po 'chad kyang gzhan gyir dring mi 'jog go //
T02TD2098E:111b-20: yang na mchog tu gyur ba gzhan mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-22: ae wam ste de'i rje bo ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:111b-23: gnyis pa ni dbyangs dang gsal byed de'i bdag po ni sku gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-24: smra ba ni ming gi tshogs te /
T02TD2098E:111b-25: gzhung lugs 'dzin pas na mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-26: tshig ni glegs bam gyi tshig ste la zhes bas de nyid gzhir byas la /
T02TD2098E:111b-27: dbang ni thabs sna tshogs pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-28: tshig ni 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i skad la /
T02TD2098E:111b-29: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa sgrogs pas mtha' yas so //
T02TD2098E:111b-30: tshig ni theg pa chen por gsungs la bden par smra ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:111b-31: ste zhes pas khyab par ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-32: de yang brtags pas sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-33: rlung bcu kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-34: sgyu ma 'gog pa'i bden pa dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-35: stong pa lam gyi bden pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-36: yang na log pa'i kun rdzob dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-37: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang /
T02TD2098E:111b-38: rnam grangs pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa dang ;
T02TD2098E:111b-39: / rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-40: de las gzhan pa ni sdug bsngal shes par bya /
T02TD2098E:111b-43: lam sgom par bya ba ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:111b-44: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:111b-45: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
T02TD2098E:112a-0: @112a * // zhes pa ni 'bras bu thob pa smos pas rgyu la zhugs pa shes par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:112a-1: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-2: rang rgyal ba se ru'i tshul zhes bya ba ni tshogs na gnas pa yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:112a-4: de yang khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
T02TD2098E:112a-5: nges par 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims so //
T02TD2098E:112a-6: sna tshogs ni so so'i sgo'i khyad par ro //
T02TD2098E:112a-8: de las 'byung ba ni dge slong la sogs pa'i yon tan ni 'byung ba sa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-9: chen po ni nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-10: rgyu ni byed pa po ste gcig po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:112a-11: de'i khyad bar ni bde ba chen po rnyed pas mtha' gnyis la 'jigs pa med pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-12: mngon zhen gyi gdung ba dang bral bas /
T02TD2098E:112a-15: bde ba dang gis 'byung bas dri mas ma gos pa ni /
T02TD2098E:112a-16: gsal bar 'gyur bas rnyog pa med ces pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112a-17: thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-18: rig pa dang ni zhes pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-19: rkang par ldan zhes pa ni lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-20: de las bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ba ni thun mong gi theg pa chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:112a-21: de thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa'i 'dren pa zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:112a-22: bdag gi la sogs pa ni gnyis dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-23: bden pa la sogs pa ni gnyis su med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-24: 'khor ba la sogs pa ni yongs su dag pa'i dri ma med pa'i cha'i phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-25: bya ba dang bral ba ni 'bad pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-26: des nyon mongs pa'i 'dam mi gnas pa ni skam sar gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:112a-27: ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba //
T02TD2098E:112a-28: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu thams cad lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112a-29: des gzugs la sogs pa 'joms pas thams cad dam pa'i chos su 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:112a-30: gnyug ma 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyal po dang ldan no //
T02TD2098E:112a-31: de bas na 'jig rten pa thams cad la snang bar byed pa ni mchog rgya chen po nyid do //
T02TD2098E:112b-0: kho bo ni mi gnas pa'i sa bon las mi gnas pa'i @112b 'bras bur 'byung zhes brtags pa ltar 'dir yang rnal 'byor gyi ye shes su bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:112b-1: chos ni sna tshogs la chos kyi dbang phyug ni sems so //
T02TD2098E:112b-2: chos rnams rigs brgyad la mchog gi rgyal po ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-3: de legs par sangs rgyas kyi lam ston pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:112b-4: the tshom la mi gnas so //
T02TD2098E:112b-5: don ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-6: grub pa ni rang gi ngo bor ro //
T02TD2098E:112b-7: bsam pa ni ma bcos pa ste grub pa ni brtags mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-8: rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings ni bstan pa thos pa dang 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pas mi zad pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-9: de'i phyir zad mi shes zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:112b-10: rgyun chad la mi gnas so //
T02TD2098E:112b-11: bsod nams ldan pa ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:112b-12: bsod nams kyi shugs kyis bskyed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-13: ye shes ni gzugs brnyan gyi lhan cig skyes ba bsgoms pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-14: ye shes khyad par che zhes bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-15: ngo bo nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-16: de ni dogs pa med pa'i bde ba dang /
T02TD2098E:112b-17: stong pa nyid chen po gnyis zung 'jug tu tha dad pa yod med shes zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-18: de la blo dang rang gi bye brag gis thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-19: spang bya dang spong byed gnyis gnyis la mi gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:112b-20: spang bya gnyis med dang spong byed gnyis med ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-21: de yang mi gnas pa ni tshogs gnyis la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-22: rnal 'byor can zhes pa ni bden pa yang bral ba'i mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-23: bsam gtan ni rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-25: de rang gi ngo bor ldan pas mchog ces bya ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-26: rang byung bas dus gsum la mi gnas so //
T02TD2098E:112b-27: de yang rang rig pa'i ngo bor gstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:112b-28: so so rang rig ces pa ni rkyen gzhan la rag ma las pa'o //
T02TD2098E:112b-29: mi g-yo ba ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-30: gnyis med gnyis la mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:112b-31: gnyis kyis gnyis med mi bskyod pa ste //
T02TD2098E:112b-32: 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02TD2098E:112b-33: de nyid ni dpal mchog dang bo'i skyes bu ste /
T02TD2098E:112b-35: dang po zhes pa ni zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu ste /
T02TD2098E:113a-2: sku gsum la sogs ba ni de nyid la thams cad mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-3: cod pan zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa thams cad do //
T02TD2098E:113a-4: skyed pa po zhes pa ni thams cad kyi byed pa po'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-5: sras po zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i phru gu lta bu ste /
T02TD2098E:113a-6: mngon sum du ma gyur pa la dgongs pa'o ;
T02TD2098E:113a-7: / dam pa'i mchog ces pa ni sras la khyad par du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-8: skye gnas kyi rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-9: shes pa srid pa gsum du 'byung la /
T02TD2098E:113a-10: srid gsum skye ba med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin du rig pas skye gnas med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-11: dngos po'i rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-12: chos ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-13: de las 'byung ba ni srid pa gsum mo //
T02TD2098E:113a-14: de rten 'brel las skyes pa'i sbyor ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni sel zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-15: du ma'i rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-16: gcig bu zhes bya ba'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:113a-17: lam gyi rnyog ba can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-18: skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag / ces bya ba'i don ni /
T02TD2098E:113a-19: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin du chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:113a-20: bcos ma'i rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-21: nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni rgyu las ma skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:113a-22: rkyen la rag ma las par rang 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-23: btang snyoms kyi rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-24: dper na mes bsregs shing gsal bar byed pa ltar /
T02TD2098E:113a-25: 'dir yang mi bo che zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:113a-26: mun pa la ni mar me bzhin //
T02TD2098E:113a-27: zhes bya ba ste bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:113a-28: dngos po'i rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-30: ma rig pa'i rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-31: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
T02TD2098E:113a-32: zhes bya ba la rtsod gzhi the tshom med par byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-33: phyogs kyi rnyog pa can ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:113a-35: gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba ni ye shes lngar dbyer mi phyed pa ste /
T02TD2098E:113a-36: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas brtags pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:113a-37: da ni de nyid mya ngan las 'das ba'i 'khor lor snang bar bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:113a-38: sngags mchog ni ye shes la gsungs la /
T02TD2098E:113a-39: mnga' bdag ni rigs thams cad kyi'o /
T02TD2098E:113a-40: rig sngags la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:113a-42: 'gro ba kun dga' bar byed pa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa dang ldan bas so //
T02TD2098E:113b-0: drang srong ni rgyun @113b dag ba ste che dgu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas so //
T02TD2098E:113b-1: des mchod cing brjod pa'i gnas ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o zhes dgongs so //
T02TD2098E:113b-2: de la rnal 'byor mchog gi mchod brjod ji ltar bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-3: rigs gsum ni sku gsung thugs 'chang ba ni gsang ba gsum tha mi dad par ro //
T02TD2098E:113b-4: gsang sngags ni thabs dang shes rab ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-5: nang gi bdag nyid du ldan pa la can zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-7: la la shes rab rang bzhin te //
T02TD2098E:113b-8: ra sa thabs su yang dag gnas //
T02TD2098E:113b-9: aa wa ddh'u t'i dbus nas su //
T02TD2098E:113b-12: dam tshig chen po ni lhan cig ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-13: gsang sngags 'jin pa yang ae wam gyi rnam grangs thams cad tha mi dad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-14: gtso bo ni 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-15: dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa ni nang gi dkon mchog gsum ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-17: stong pa snying rje tha dad med //
T02TD2098E:113b-18: sems ni gang du rab bsgom pa //
T02TD2098E:113b-19: de nyid sangs rgyas chos dang ni //
T02TD2098E:113b-22: theg pa nyan thos la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-23: dkon mchog gsum ni rnam dag tu ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-24: don yod zhags pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2098E:113b-25: rnam par rgyal ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD2098E:113b-26: 'dzin pa chen po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-27: rdo rje zhags pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD2098E:113b-28: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-29: rdo rje chen po zhags pas ni sems can bskyed pa dang dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2098E:113b-30: de kho na nyid chen po 'dzin pa dang ;
T02TD2098E:113b-31: / snying rje'i zhags pas 'khor bar 'jug kyang skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
T02TD2098E:113b-32: dam tshig gi lcags kyus 'gro ba'i don du phrin las mdzad pa'i rigs kyi 'khor lo brjod pa ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-33: de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:113b-34: rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i rgyud nas bshad pa'i bar gyis yon tan gyi rnam grangs su bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:113b-35: de la rdo rje 'jigs byed ni rtags so //
T02TD2098E:113b-36: gnyis pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa dag par byed pas don de nyid kyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-0: khro bo'i rgyal po ni ma rtogs pa dang rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal @114a * //
T02TD2098E:114a-2: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-3: gdong drug la sogs pa ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:114a-9: yon tan gyi mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi thig le dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-12: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-13: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-14: de dang tha mi dad pa'i dam tshig ni bde ba dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-15: dus kyi rlung zin pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-17: thams cad ro gcig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-18: re ba med pa'i smon lam dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-19: so sor rtog ba'i ye shes kyi mig gis bltas la zung rdu med pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-23: re ba med pa dang sgro 'dogs chod pa'i lag tu thogs pas phyag rgya chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:114a-24: rig pa mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-25: keng rus ni snying po mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-26: 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-27: mche ba gcigs pa ni bdung bzhi bcom nas ye shes bzhi snang bar gyur pa ste //
T02TD2098E:114a-28: rdo rje gsang lus kyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-29: ha la ha la ni gnyis med kyi bcud kyis 'bigs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-30: don yod zhags pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-31: gdong brgya pa ni gdul bya'i rnam rtog dang mthun par 'byung bas rgyal ba rnams ni chos kyi sku yin te /
T02TD2098E:114a-32: rdo rje thod pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-33: gshin rje gshed po ni 'jig rten pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-35: theg pa chen po la gnas ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-37: rnal 'byor gyi 'joms pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-38: bgegs ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-41: bdud de dag lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114a-44: don gcig pa nyid kyis rgyal ba ni rnam par snad mdzad /
T02TD2098E:114a-45: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-46: rdo rje shugs chen ni rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-47: dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-48: 'jigs par byed pa ni rigs pa'i mthus gti mug nyid de bzhin nyid du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-49: zla gsar thig le'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114a-50: rdo rje grags pa ni ye shes nyid sna tshogs su grags pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114a-51: gnyis med rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las so//
T02TD2098E:114b-0: @114b rdo rje snying zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i bsnyen par gyur ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-1: zla gsang nor bu thig le rgyan gyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-2: sgyu 'phrul zhes pa ni thams cad sgyu ma dang 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang 'dra bar bstan ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-3: khri drug stong pa 'di nyid las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-4: rdo rje gsus po che ni zung 'jug gis yid rgyas pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-5: gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-6: rdo rje las skyes ni sems bde ba chen po las sna tshogs skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-7: 'byung phyogs bzhag pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-8: rdo rje bdag ces pa ni sna tshogs bde ba chen po nyid du bstan pa ste //
T02TD2098E:114b-9: rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-10: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02TD2098E:114b-11: zhas pa ni skyes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114b-12: thag pa gnyis kyis gcig pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-13: nam mkha' 'dzin gyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-14: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad do //
T02TD2098E:114b-15: he ru ka sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-16: ral ba gcig gis bskyings zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:114b-17: rang gi ngo bor 'khor 'das thams cad ye shes gcig gis bsgyings shing /
T02TD2098E:114b-18: dbang po thams cad nyams myong gcig gis bsgyings pa ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-19: rdo rje cod pan gyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-20: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
T02TD2098E:114b-22: rtogs pa la sems brtan pa dang /
T02TD2098E:114b-23: thabs dang shes rab rgyud la goms par bya ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-24: 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-25: drag chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa //
T02TD2098E:114b-26: zhes pa ni mtha' gnyis sel ba dang /
T02TD2098E:114b-27: thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba gzhan la bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-28: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-29: hi hi zhes sgrogs zhes pa ni //
T02TD2098E:114b-30: rang rgyud la sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-31: khro bo thig le zla ba'i rgyud las so//
T02TD2098E:114b-32: 'jigs par byed pa zhes ba ni /
T02TD2098E:114b-33: rtag chad dang kyi mtha' dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-34: kun las btus pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-35: gad mo chen po ni rang 'byung gsang ba mthod ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-36: sku khros pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-37: gad rgyangs can ni zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-38: rdo rje thod pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-39: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs bas zhes pa ni //
T02TD2098E:114b-40: rdo rje tsanda l'ir 'bar ba ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-41: rdo rje bsam gtan gyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-43: de kho na nyid bsdus ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-44: sems dpa' che zhes pa ni longs sbyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02TD2098E:114b-45: dgyes pa rdo rje las so //
T02TD2098E:114b-46: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
T02TD2098E:115a-1: pa ni bde ba chen po'i sku ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-2: padma dang rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-3: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //
T02TD2098E:115a-4: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-5: rtog pa bzhi pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-6: rdo rje h'um ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu med pa dang /
T02TD2098E:115a-8: mi gnas pa rang rgyud la sbyangs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-9: he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-10: h'um zhes sgrogs zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115a-11: de nyid gzhan la ston pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-12: rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-13: mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa //
T02TD2098E:115a-14: zhes pa ni tshogs drug thug phrad ye shes rang chas su ston pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-15: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-16: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
T02TD2098E:115a-17: ces pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis goms pa'i mthu bstan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-18: dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-20: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus te /
T02TD2098E:115a-21: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung bstan gyi rgyu las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-22: rdo rje gcig pu zhes pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:115a-23: 'jam dpal lung bstan pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-24: g-yul sel ni phung po la sogs pa'i tshogs bzlog pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-25: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-26: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115a-27: bde ba chen po nyid rigs kyi sku sna tshogs su snang ba'i snying rje'i spyan te /
T02TD2098E:115a-28: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-29: mig mi bzad ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115a-30: sku sna tshogs nyid bde ba chen po'i skur gcig pa ye shes kyi sbyan te /
T02TD2098E:115a-31: bsam gtan rtse mo'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-32: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02TD2098E:115a-33: zhes pa ni snying po srid pa gsum la khyab pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-34: mngon par mthong ba'i rgyud las so /
T02TD2098E:115a-35: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni sku gsung thugs rab tu gnas pas phyag gi 'os su gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-36: bdud rtsi'i mchog gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-38: dam pa'i drin gyis bla ma'i bla ma dang /
T02TD2098E:115a-39: rdo rje 'chang gi byin rlabs zhugs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-40: thugs khros pa rdo rje'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-41: mig brgya pa ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115a-42: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyud gzigs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-43: spyan ras gzigs snying gur gcig pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-44: rdo rje mig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2098E:115a-45: sangs rgyas spyan dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115a-46: rdo rje zhi ba'i bde ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115a-47: lus ni rdo rje'i bspu can //
T02TD2098E:115b-0: rdo rje ye shes kyi rnal 'byor rgyud las skyes pa'i ba @115b spu'i dug re re zhig nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi kha sbyor ba'i sdom pa bzhugs so //
T02TD2098E:115b-1: kun du kha sbyor ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-2: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //
T02TD2098E:115b-3: zhes pa ni sa bcu'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'am /
T02TD2098E:115b-4: stobs bcu dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-5: gshin rje gshed bzhi brgya lnga bcu'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-6: rdo rje snying po zhes pa ni 'khor ba bde chen gyi snying po can te /
T02TD2098E:115b-7: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-8: pags pa mkhregs zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115b-9: go cha gsum dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-10: sgyu ma bsgrags pa'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-11: rdo rje phreng thogs zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:115b-15: lha mo bzhi'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-16: dpal dang ldan zhes pa ni mi slob pa'i sku ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-17: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-18: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD2098E:115b-19: zhes pa ni phung po la sogs pa thams cad ye shes rang chas su ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-20: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-21: gang rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
T02TD2098E:115b-22: zhes pa ni zil kyis mi gnon pa'i phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-23: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-24: yi ge drug pa zhes pa ni 'gro ba drug dang /
T02TD2098E:115b-25: rigs drug gi rnam par dag pa ni aom w'a g'i shva ri mum zhes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-26: de yang chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-27: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis aom mo //
T02TD2098E:115b-28: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis aam ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-29: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:115b-30: wa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:115b-31: aa zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bar du brgyan pa ste gzugs so //
T02TD2098E:115b-33: a'i zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pas dben pa ste tshor ba'o //
T02TD2098E:115b-34: shva zhes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2098E:115b-35: ba zhes pa ni gsung ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-36: aa zhes pa ni ming dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-38: ma zhes pa ni lam mo //
T02TD2098E:115b-40: aa zhes pa ni gnas te 'du byed do //
T02TD2098E:115b-41: aa zhes pa ni mnyam pa ye shes kyi phung po can no //
T02TD2098E:115b-42: de dag ni khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug gi rgyud las so //
T02TD2098E:115b-43: rdo rje sgra zhes pa ni gnyis med kyi gsung ste /
T02TD2098E:115b-44: de gang las bstod ce na /
T02TD2098E:115b-45: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:115b-46: sgra che ba ni thams cad la grags pa'o //
T02TD2098E:115b-47: 'jig rten gsum na sgra che ba //
T02TD2098E:116a-0: zhes pa ni de dag thams cad @116a * //
T02TD2098E:116a-1: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rnam grangs la ched du brjod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-2: de la sogs pa'i nam mkha'i mthas klas pa ni /
T02TD2098E:116a-3: sgra sgrogs pa thams cad 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyid la ched du brjod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-4: gzhan ched du brjod pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:116a-7: yod pa dang yin pa'i khyad par te /
T02TD2098E:116a-8: 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i theg pa gsum zhes grags pa ni yod la /
T02TD2098E:116a-9: don ji lta ba ni ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:116a-10: de ci'i phyir zhe na phyogs na gnas pas so //
T02TD2098E:116a-11: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni yin no //
T02TD2098E:116a-12: yod pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:116a-14: rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste /
T02TD2098E:116a-15: chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khong su gtogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-16: chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas /
T02TD2098E:116a-17: gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas /
T02TD2098E:116a-18: gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas /
T02TD2098E:116a-19: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so //
T02TD2098E:116a-20: rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:116a-21: de bsa na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyid gzugs sna tshogs su ston pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:116a-22: yang dag bdag med ces pa la sogs pa la rags pa'i rnam par rtog pa log bzhin pas na yang dag go //
T02TD2098E:116a-23: yang dag bdag med ni grub pa'i mtha'i don la dmigs pa med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:116a-25: don gyis ming mtshon pa ni yang dag mtha' ste /
T02TD2098E:116a-26: de dag dang bral bas na /
T02TD2098E:116a-27: yi ge med ces bya ba'i cha rang bzhin med pa dang /
T02TD2098E:116a-29: de las kyang mchog tu gyur pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-30: ste zhas pa ni de'i yon tan bsdu bar bya ba'i don to /
T02TD2098E:116a-31: zab cing zhes pa ni bde ba'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-32: rgya che ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-33: sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis med du'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-34: de la slob ma la bstan par bya ba yin pas chos kyi dung zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:116a-35: ste zhes pas man ngag ston pa ste /
T02TD2098E:116a-36: de nyid kyi yul so sor nges pa la yid ches par byas nas spros pa mi gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2098E:116a-37: sgra che ldan zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:116b-0: bla ma'i zhal las rig par @116b bya'o ;
T02TD2098E:116b-1: / chos kyi gand'i sgra po che //
T02TD2098E:116b-4: theg pa gsum gyi tshogs la bshad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116b-5: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
T02TD2098E:116b-7: slob ma la bshad pa'i snying po ston par byed pa ste /
T02TD2098E:116b-8: de las bstan pa'i bdag po nyid kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na /
T02TD2098E:116b-9: ae ni shes rab nyid 'gyur la //
T02TD2098E:116b-10: wam ni rab dga'i bdag po ste //
T02TD2098E:116b-11: thig le mi shigs de nyid las //
T02TD2098E:116b-12: de la yi ge nyid kyang skyes //
T02TD2098E:116b-13: chos kyi phyag rgya'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2098E:116b-14: de nyid shes pa gang gis shes //
T02TD2098E:116b-15: des ni sems can thams cad la //
T02TD2098E:116b-18: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02TD2098E:116b-19: zhes pa ni tshogs la bshad pas bstan pa'i gzugs brtan par byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:116b-21: rtags can gzugs la gnas gyur na //
T02TD2098E:116b-23: gang zhig cho ga 'dir gnas pa //
T02TD2098E:116b-24: de ni bstan pa 'jig byed gsungs //
T02TD2098E:116b-26: / thun mong bstan pa gzung ngo //
T02TD2098E:116b-27: de yang rang gi rang bzhin du bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:116b-28: gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:116b-29: gzugs med ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:116b-31: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02TD2098E:116b-32: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02TD2098E:116b-33: stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD2098E:116b-34: byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD2098E:116b-36: gzugs bzang zhes pa ni las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2098E:116b-38: na chung gzhon nu mig yangs la //
T02TD2098E:116b-39: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yin //
T02TD2098E:116b-40: lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed //
T02TD2098E:116b-41: byol song las kyang rab tu brtag / ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:116b-42: dam pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2098E:116b-44: ae ma kun du bzang po yi //
T02TD2098E:116b-45: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can //
T02TD2098E:116b-46: skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2098E:116b-47: skye ba dam pa rab tu grags //
T02TD2098E:116b-49: sna tshogs gzugs can ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2098E:116b-51: ye shes la gzhan phyogs pa yang //
T02TD2098E:116b-52: sangs rgyas sku ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:116b-53: 'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du //
T02TD2098E:116b-54: de ltar rnal 'byor smra bar rigs //
T02TD2098E:116b-56: yid las skyes zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po yid kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-0: de nyid gzugs rnams thams cad du snang ba'i dpal zhes @117a * //
T02TD2098E:117a-2: / gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po //
T02TD2098E:117a-3: zhes pa ni sngar gyi don 'di nyid de 'bras bu zung du 'jug pa 'di nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:117a-7: mtshungs pa med pa la sogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-8: de nyid rgyu yin pas 'gran zla med cing bdag po dang bral bas che bar grags pa'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-9: khams gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po ni yul med pa'i shes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-12: bsam pa bzhin du mi sems pa //
T02TD2098E:117a-13: de ni bsam gyis mi khyab brjod //
T02TD2098E:117a-16: shin tu mtho ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-17: de la gnas pa ni rang 'byung ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-19: rang 'byung rtogs pas bsam gtan min /
T02TD2098E:117a-20: sangs rgyas sprul pa rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD2098E:117a-22: dar ba chen po ni rgyas pa ste de las rang gi don du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-23: chos kyi tog ni rgyal mtshan te gzhan du'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-24: 'jig rten la sogs pa ni 'bras bur bshad pa ste //
T02TD2098E:117a-25: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:117a-26: bgres pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-27: gnas brtan ni theg pa gsum gyi lus su gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:117a-28: rgan po ni thog ma med pas so //
T02TD2098E:117a-29: skye dgu'i bdag ni 'khor 'das kyi skyed mar gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:117a-30: sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:117a-31: de gsal ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:117a-32: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2098E:117a-33: 'jig rten shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-35: 'jig rten legs par shes pa ni de nyid sems kyi khyad par du shes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-36: rdo rje slob dpon las so //
T02TD2098E:117a-37: ste zhes pa slob dpon gyi bye brag gzhan du bsdu ba'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-39: ces pa snang ba slob dpon du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117a-40: mngon zhen dang bral bas 'jigs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-41: mgon skyabs 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
T02TD2098E:117a-42: zhes pa ni rang sems bla mar gyur pas mgon po mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T02TD2098E:117a-44: yid phyag rgya chen po tha mi dad par gcugs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:117a-47: dang zhes pas de'i che ba dang drin dran par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-0: skyob pa @117b zhes pa ni snang bas yid skyob pas dbang po rang snang du rol par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-1: bla na med ces pa ni sems nyid bla ma bla na med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117b-2: skyo bar mi bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2098E:117b-4: ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bar //
T02TD2098E:117b-5: thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya //
T02TD2098E:117b-6: skyo bar gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2098E:117b-9: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
T02TD2098E:117b-10: zhes pa ni thams cad ye shes sems dpar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtha' //
T02TD2098E:117b-12: zhes pa ni de lta bu nyid rang la gnas par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-13: ma rig sgo ba'i sbubs 'byed pa //
T02TD2098E:117b-14: zhes pa ni bstan pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:117b-15: dbul po'i gter bzhin du mtshon dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:117b-17: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
T02TD2098E:117b-19: dgos pa bzlog pa'i phyir dper na s'a lu'i sa bon la srin bu ga snga zhugs pas ljang pa skams par 'gyur ba bzhin /
T02TD2098E:117b-20: dra ba ma rig pa bcom pas sngar bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par yang zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-21: de las khyad par med pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:117b-22: dper na dug la sngags kyis btab pas dug zhi ba dang sman du gyur pa gnyig 'byung ste /
T02TD2098E:117b-23: de bzhin du thabs ye shes sems dpa'i dus na 'khor bzhi pa'am /
T02TD2098E:117b-24: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bas //
T02TD2098E:117b-25: 'khor ba'i rgyu mtsho pha rol phyin //
T02TD2098E:117b-27: ye shes la sogs pa ni dri ma dang bral bar bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2098E:117b-28: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:117b-29: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bus dbang bskur ba'i rigs lnga'i cod pan du gyur te /
T02TD2098E:117b-30: can zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bstan pa de dang po'o //
T02TD2098E:117b-31: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
T02TD2098E:117b-32: zhes pa ni sku gnyis kyis slob ma'i 'khor lo bzhir byin gyis brlabs shing thig le rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:117b-34: ni ram su yis yan lag brgyan //
T02TD2098E:117b-35: zhes pa dang bla ma cod pan du gzung bar bya ba'i tha tshig kyang ngo //
T02TD2098E:117b-36: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:117b-39: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis 'dus pa'i 'gro ba ste /
T02TD2098E:117b-40: de las grol zhing bde ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur bas na /
T02TD2098E:118a-2: grol gsum thob ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:118a-5: phyogs char 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-6: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa bya ba dang bral ba ston te /
T02TD2098E:118a-7: sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-8: dus med rtogs pas rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-9: yon tan ni sgrib pa spangs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-11: cod pan ni sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2098E:118a-12: de'i yang thod du gyur pa ni bla ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-14: dam tshig dag ni thams cad las //
T02TD2098E:118a-15: bla ma mchod pa mchog yin te //
T02TD2098E:118a-16: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /
T02TD2098E:118a-17: dpal ldan 'dus pa'am gzhan du bstan //
T02TD2098E:118a-20: khams gsum rin po cher gyur pa //
T02TD2098E:118a-21: slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan med //
T02TD2098E:118a-22: gang las bka' drin thob pa yis //
T02TD2098E:118a-23: mkhas pas dngos grub du ma thob //
T02TD2098E:118a-25: lus kun las ni rnam grol ba //
T02TD2098E:118a-26: zhes pa ni 'khor 'das kyi bye brag gis dkar po'i chos dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-29: sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa las grol bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:118a-31: 'khrul pa zhig pas gnyen po mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:118a-32: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-33: bzang ngan shes pa ni snod kyi bye brag mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-34: dus shes pa ni bstan pa'i go rims mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-35: dam shes pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-36: rtag tu don mdzad pa ni dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-37: dbang po shes pa ni dus shes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-38: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
T02TD2098E:118a-39: zhes pa ni dus gsum las rnam par grol ba'i thabs gsum la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118a-40: nyid kyi thugs su chud cing gzhan la ston pas /
T02TD2098E:118a-41: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
T02TD2098E:118a-43: sva sti rgyud las skyes pa'i rang bzhin du bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:118a-44: shes pa lnga'i khyad par ni bla ma la gus par 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-45: rjes thob med par 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-46: 'khor ba las ni ring du gyur par 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-47: sems la dbang bar 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2098E:118a-48: zug rngu med par 'byung ba ste /
T02TD2098E:118a-49: de yang gzhi bla ma dang /
T02TD2098E:118b-3: brnga las chos kyi de nyid shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:118b-7: sna tshogs rol mo las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:118b-8: de rang dbang du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:118b-9: spyod pa'i khyad par ni 'dis 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:118b-10: snyan grags dge dang zhes pa ni kun bzang dge ba'i spyod pa ste /
T02TD2098E:118b-11: bla ma la brten par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:118b-12: dbugs 'byin chen po zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:118b-13: sems dbugs 'byin pa'i gsang spyod do //
T02TD2098E:118b-14: dga' ston che zhes pa ni dga' ba ston pa'i rig pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:118b-15: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02TD2098E:118b-16: zhes pa ni dga' ba chen po'i nyams kyis snang ba la rol mo lta bur spyod pa ste /
T02TD2098E:118b-18: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2098E:118b-20: de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i sems la sna tshogs kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur bas phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par gyur pa ste bsnyen spyod do //
T02TD2098E:118b-22: rtag tu du ba'i spyod pa bzhin //
T02TD2098E:118b-23: mi g-yo ba yi sems kyis ni //
T02TD2098E:118b-24: dngos grub ster ba'i bla ma la //
T02TD2098E:118b-25: 'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2098E:118b-27: bud med rab tu ma dangs bzang ma //
T02TD2098E:118b-28: lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa ni //
T02TD2098E:118b-29: dri dang me tog phreng brgyan pa'i //
T02TD2098E:118b-30: yon tan ske rags m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2098E:118b-31: shes rab can gyis byin brlabs la ;
T02TD2098E:118b-32: / de yi dbus su mnyes par bya //
T02TD2098E:118b-33: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:118b-35: dbugs 'byin mchog dang bar ma dang //
T02TD2098E:118b-36: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02TD2098E:118b-37: rtag tu dus kyi khyad par gyis //
T02TD2098E:118b-38: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
T02TD2098E:118b-39: dgos pa bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs la /
T02TD2098E:118b-40: rigs kyi sman pa'i 'du shes dang //
T02TD2098E:118b-41: 'jigs pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2098E:118b-43: sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go //
T02TD2098E:118b-45: sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:118b-46: gzhan yang rang gi don dang phal cher gzhan gyi don du /
T02TD2098E:118b-47: dag cing yon tan gyi ni gnas //
T02TD2098E:118b-48: sna tshogs yon tan phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2098E:118b-49: zhes pa la sogs pa nus pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2098E:118b-50: grub pa'i rnal 'byor la yang rung //
T02TD2098E:118b-51: zhes pa ni brnga mtshon pa dang /
T02TD2098E:118b-52: mi yi bu mo mthu chen gyis //
T02TD2098E:119a-2: lha rdzas brtsun mo dgug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-3: nus pa gal te med 'gyur ram //
T02TD2098E:119a-5: des ni mi yi bu mo bsten //
T02TD2098E:119a-6: zhes pa la sogs pas bye brag shes par byas la /
T02TD2098E:119a-7: bsten par bya ba'i dgos pa ni /
T02TD2098E:119a-10: lus kyi sbyin pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2098E:119a-11: phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsa ma //
T02TD2098E:119a-12: skal ldan skal min spyad nas ni //
T02TD2098E:119a-13: de yi sbyin pa gtang mi bya //
T02TD2098E:119a-15: cung zad nus pa bskyed nas ni /
T02TD2098E:119a-16: rol zhing grong du 'jug par bya //
T02TD2098E:119a-18: gzhan yang bza' btung thob pa dang /
T02TD2098E:119a-19: bgrod dang bgrod min spang par bya /
T02TD2098E:119a-20: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02TD2098E:119a-21: grong gi chos ni spang mi bya //
T02TD2098E:119a-22: blo ldan sdags ni bzla mi bya //
T02TD2098E:119a-23: bsam gtan dmigs par mi bya ste //
T02TD2098E:119a-24: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-25: dbang po dgag par mi bya ste //
T02TD2098E:119a-26: sha rnams thams cad bza' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-27: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyod //
T02TD2098E:119a-28: ces pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2098E:119a-29: gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni //
T02TD2098E:119a-30: mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD2098E:119a-32: de ltar spyod pa bye brag ni gang zag gi rim pas rim dang cig car dang rang bzhin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-33: mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'i don du bshad par bya ste ;
T02TD2098E:119a-34: / mchog tu dga' ba ni dam par dga' ba ste //
T02TD2098E:119a-35: rnam gcod yongs gcod dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-36: de ston par mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2098E:119a-37: mchog sbyin gtso bo zhes bya ste /
T02TD2098E:119a-38: snying po ni don gyi sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2098E:119a-39: des gang la bstan par bya ba yang grags bdag dpal ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-40: bcom ldan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-41: de'i yang skyabs kyi dam par gyur pa ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2098E:119a-43: dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas gzhan med pa'i phyir skyabs su 'os zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-45: 'jig rten sgra ste zhes pas ma rtogs pa log par rtog pa dang /
T02TD2098E:119a-46: the tshom mthar byed ba'i don to //
T02TD2098E:119a-47: de nas gnyug ma ston pa'i phyir rab kyi mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-48: da ni tha mar dge bston te /
T02TD2098E:119a-49: sel ba po ni phyag rgya chen pos so //
T02TD2098E:119a-50: gtsug phud la sogs pa'i bye brag ni ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119a-51: gdong lnga zhes pa ni rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-0: gtsug phud lnga @119b dang ldan zhes pa ni de nyid gzhan gyi don du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-1: des par du dge ba bstan te /
T02TD2098E:119b-2: zur phud lnga pa zhes pa ni 'dod yon lnga pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-3: me tog ces pa ni dbang po'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-4: thod ces pa ni rgyan ta bde ba chen por ro //
T02TD2098E:119b-5: mgo zlum dang brtul zhugs chen po gnyis ni tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog gi rtags te /
T02TD2098E:119b-6: theg pa thun mong ba khyad par gyi bye brag gis so //
T02TD2098E:119b-7: 'dir ni mtshan ma'i rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:119b-8: dka' thub mthar phyin pa ste tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-10: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas //
T02TD2098E:119b-12: rtag par dge ba bzhi pa ste //
T02TD2098E:119b-13: thams cad bdag nyid gnas pa kun //
T02TD2098E:119b-14: dam pa'i bde bde nyid do //
T02TD2098E:119b-16: nyon mongs pa mi spong ba la sogs pa ni dka' thub chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:119b-17: phyag rgya chen po nyid nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mchog go //
T02TD2098E:119b-18: dang por dge ba bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:119b-19: gtsang gnas zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-20: gnas pa dam pa zhes pa ni btsun mo'i bha ga'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-21: goo ta ma zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:119b-22: nyon mongs pa mi mnga' ba bram ze'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-23: tshangs pa ni gzung bas stong ba ste /
T02TD2098E:119b-25: gnyis pa ni 'dzin pas stong pa ste mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-26: shes pa ni bde ba chen po ste rnyed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-27: mya ngan 'das zhes pa ni dri ma dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-28: tshangs pa ni btang snyoms dang bral ba ste snying po len pas na thob pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-30: thar pa ni bzhi pa'i man ngag go //
T02TD2098E:119b-31: rnal grol lus ni bzhi pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2098E:119b-32: mtshan nyid gsum ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:119b-33: rang gi ngo bo 'ba' zhig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:119b-34: zhi ba gnyis ni nang dang nang du yang dag par gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-35: mya ngan las 'das pa gsum ni grags chen dang snying po don dang rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2098E:119b-36: bde sdug sel ba ni 'khor ba gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-37: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
T02TD2098E:119b-38: zhes pa ni nyan thos zhi ba'i sa las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-39: thub pa med pa ni me 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:119b-40: dpe med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-0: mi mngon pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i @120a * //
T02TD2098E:120a-2: mi snang ba ni blo'i yul la mi snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-3: gsal byed min ni lus kyis gsal bar mi nus pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-4: phra ba ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-5: zag med ni mngon du rgyu dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-6: sa bon zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-7: shin tu sad pa ni ma rig pa'i gnyid sad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-8: sang pa'i bdag ni rang bzhin gyis grol ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-9: kun shes ni chos thams cad do //
T02TD2098E:120a-10: kun rig ni don thams cad do //
T02TD2098E:120a-11: rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das //
T02TD2098E:120a-12: zhes pa ni rtog dpyod dang bral pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-13: las byed pa ni gdul bya'i blo la snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-14: thog ma tha ma med pa ni skye 'jig dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-15: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02TD2098E:120a-17: log rtog can kha cig dang po'i 'dren par gyur pa thabs gang la brten nas sangs rgyas zhes zer ba'i log rtogs bzlog par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:120a-18: dper na nam mkha' la sprin dang /
T02TD2098E:120a-22: 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'byung gi / nam mkha' rgyu rkyen gang las skye rtogs shig / gal te nam mkha' las byung ngo zhe na /
T02TD2098E:120a-23: da lta'i ri rab gling dang bcas pa 'di dag gis go phye ste gang gis rjes su song zhing bskyed /
T02TD2098E:120a-24: gal te bskyed na nam mkha' snang bar bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2098E:120a-25: gal te mtshan nydi mi mthun na chos 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gang du yin /
T02TD2098E:120a-26: gal te mtshan nyid gcig na tha dad pa med par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02TD2098E:120a-27: de bzhin du dang por rang bzhin gyi chos las nus pa sna tshogs su 'char bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:120a-28: de nyid rgyu rkyen las skyes par snang mod kyi /
T02TD2098E:120a-29: rang bzhin gyi chos rgyu dang rkyen gang gis bskyed rtogs shig / gal te tha dad na brtags pa dang brtags pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang dag yin /
T02TD2098E:120a-30: mtshan nyid gcig ni 'gal ba gang la yod de med do //
T02TD2098E:120a-31: de bas na rang bzhin nyid las lhun gyis grub pa dang /
T02TD2098E:120a-32: mngon du gyur pa ni bde ba chen por ro gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:120a-34: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02TD2098E:120a-35: zhes pas rgyu la mi gnas pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2098E:120a-36: blo dngos gcig tu 'brel par byed pa ni /
T02TD2098E:120a-37: ye shes kyi mig gcig pa ste /
T02TD2098E:120a-38: de la dri ma med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120a-39: don mi 'byung ba ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:120b-0: ye @120b shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2098E:120b-2: mi gnas pa nyid du bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:120b-3: tshig gi dbang phyug ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:120b-4: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa'i bye brag gis don gnyis su ston pa na smra ba che zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-5: smra pa'i skyes mchog gis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-6: smra ba'i rkyen ni dbang po dang sbyar bas ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-7: smra ba'i dam pa zhes pa ni thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin gcig pur ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-8: mchog gi gnas ni mchog gi dngos po grub pa'i gsung 'byung ba'i gnas so //
T02TD2098E:120b-9: smra ba'i seng ge ni nyam ming bas so //
T02TD2098E:120b-10: smra ba'i rgyal ni tshugs pa med pa zhes pa phyogs su blta ba'i rigs kyis so //
T02TD2098E:120b-11: da ni snang pa'i rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:120b-12: kun du blta ba ni ye shes brnyes pas kun du blta ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-13: mchog tu blta ba ni don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:120b-14: gzi brjid ni ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:120b-16: blta na sdug pa ni nyams myong du'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-17: 'od bzang du ni snying po len pa'i dkyil 'khor du'o /
T02TD2098E:120b-18: 'bar ba ni rang gi shes pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:120b-19: dpal be'u ni sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:120b-20: lag na 'od 'bar ni 'jig rten gyi khams lag pa'i 'od la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2098E:120b-21: snang ba po ni yang dag thams cad ye shes kyi snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-22: sman pa che mchog ni mi shes pas na nad rab tu 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-23: gtso bo ste zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i sman gyis gso bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-24: zug rngu ni dug gsum ste seng ldeng gi tsher ma lta bu'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-25: 'byin pa ni dbang po la sogs pa gsum gyis so //
T02TD2098E:120b-26: bla na med pa ni phyis mi 'byung bas so //
T02TD2098E:120b-27: sman rnams ma lus pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
T02TD2098E:120b-28: ljon pa'i shing ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-29: 'dir ni rje btsun pas gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-31: nang do cog gi dgra che ba ;
T02TD2098E:120b-33: nyon mongs pa de snyed dkyi'o //
T02TD2098E:120b-34: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
T02TD2098E:120b-36: sems ye shes kyi dkyil du snang ba ste thabs so //
T02TD2098E:120b-37: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
T02TD2098E:120b-38: ces pa ni de nyid rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo snang ba ste shes rab po //
T02TD2098E:121a-0: de gnyis tha mi dad pa ni bskyed rdzogs @121a * //
T02TD2098E:121a-2: kho bo'i bla ma ri khrod dgon pa'i gzhung lugs so //
T02TD2098E:121a-3: de nyid bklag pa'i man ngag tu bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:121a-4: bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du zhugs pa'i tshe /
T02TD2098E:121a-5: rigs kyi lha dang mthun pa'i ched du brjod par bya ba ni /
T02TD2098E:121a-6: dbang bskur ba dang dngos grub grub pa'i bye brag gis rang rang gi nga rgyal du zhugs la ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas gnyis pa'am sgrub byed du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas so so rigs kyi ched du brjod pa gdon pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121a-7: rigs bsdus pa'i ched du brjod pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121a-8: yang mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas phyag brgya bkrol ba'o //
T02TD2098E:121a-9: de'i man ngag ni rang gi sbyor ba dang ldan pas thabs dang shes rab la gnas te /
T02TD2098E:121a-10: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2098E:121a-11: mchod sbyin sbyor bar byed pa yin //
T02TD2098E:121a-12: zhes gsungs pa ni man ngag ste /
T02TD2098E:121a-14: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:121a-15: rtags dang don gyi khyad par gyis srid pa gsum dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi mchog go //
T02TD2098E:121a-16: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
T02TD2098E:121a-17: zhes pa ni mi 'char ba med pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121a-18: de ma yin pa'i srid pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121a-20: phyogs bcu zhes ba ni gnas so //
T02TD2098E:121a-22: mthar thug pa zhes pa ni rgya de srid du chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni skal ba dang dbang po'i bye brag gis snying po dang skun pa la sogs par ro //
T02TD2098E:121a-25: bla na med pa thob par 'dod pa zhig rang la yod pa'i de nyid yod par shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121a-26: ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121a-27: des snang ba med pa dang brtags par rang grol bar gyur pa ni spangs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:121a-28: de'i snying po byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can no //
T02TD2098E:121a-30: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag ste /
T02TD2098E:121a-31: nang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2098E:121a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad gar gyi rnam pa lta bur mthong ba'o //
T02TD2098E:121a-33: de gnyis ka la yang khyab bdag chen po rin po ches khyab pas na gdugs so //
T02TD2098E:121a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
T02TD2098E:121b-0: zhes pa ni snang grags @121b thams cad la skye med ston bar nus pa'i mthu'i rang bzhin yod de /
T02TD2098E:121b-2: ma skyes pa'i snying po can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:121b-3: dper na rkun mo zhig chang gis rab tu myos na /
T02TD2098E:121b-4: bdag gis che ge mo'i nor brkus so zhes sngon par 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:121b-6: rang rgyud chang gis bzi ba yin pa'i phyir ;
T02TD2098E:121b-7: / de bas na sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i don mthong nas ji ltar bya ba'i tshul ni de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor chen po ste de nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-8: sangs rgyas la rang rgyud mi gnas pa'i phyir dgongs pa gcig ste /
T02TD2098E:121b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-10: bsgrub par mi nus pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:121b-11: tha dad pa ni sems can gyi rgyu yin la /
T02TD2098E:121b-12: de la ma rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121b-17: de la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T02TD2098E:121b-18: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD2098E:121b-19: gdod ma nas lhun gyis grub pa dang ;
T02TD2098E:121b-20: blo yis ma brtags pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121b-21: dus dang mtha' la mi gnas pa dang /
T02TD2098E:121b-23: 'gal bar gyur pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:121b-25: bdag nyid gcig pa'i bum pa bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:121b-26: da ni du mar rigs pa ston te /
T02TD2098E:121b-27: rdo rje rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD2098E:121b-28: dbang bskur dpal ni rin chen sems ma'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-29: rin chen kun bdag ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-30: dbang phyug ste zhes pa ni rdo rje sems ma'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-31: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD2098E:121b-32: kun gyi bdag ces pa ni chos kyi sems ma'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-33: rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-34: kun gyi rje zhes pa ni las kyi sems ma'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2098E:121b-36: thugs che ba zhes pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-38: rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod /
T02TD2098E:121b-39: mdor bsdus pa ni rnam pa lnga /
T02TD2098E:121b-40: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yin//
T02TD2098E:121b-41: phyis ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:121b-43: sku gsung thugs rdo rje 'dus pa ste /
T02TD2098E:121b-44: de yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' kho nar bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:121b-45: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i tshul gyis ni /
T02TD2098E:121b-46: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2098E:121b-47: sngags dang lhar ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD2098E:122a-2: don dang don gyi khyad par brlag par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:122a-3: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02TD2098E:122a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa dang sngags kyi gzhung lugs ni chos can dang chos nyid kyi lam ste /
T02TD2098E:122a-6: de'i dgongs pa yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' sems can rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122a-7: bsam pa dang dbang po dang /
T02TD2098E:122a-8: mos pa mkhyen pas kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od du 'phros nas chos ston to //
T02TD2098E:122a-9: gnyis ka theg pa chen por 'thad de //
T02TD2098E:122a-10: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2098E:122a-11: zhes pas gcig ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la /
T02TD2098E:122a-12: 'dir ni padma'i nam mkhar ze'u 'bru gang //
T02TD2098E:122a-13: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas dag tu //
T02TD2098E:122a-14: sems kyi nor bu nang du chud pa la //
T02TD2098E:122a-15: ye shes gang skyes de ni brjod med gzugs //
T02TD2098E:122a-16: zhes gsungs pa'i man ngag gis sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122a-18: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i stobs kyis 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i tshod 'dod chags la sogs pa de nyid thabs khyad par can gyis byang chub kyi yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i sgo nas sems can 'dzin par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:122a-20: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2098E:122a-21: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
T02TD2098E:122a-22: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug bzhin du //
T02TD2098E:122a-23: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2098E:122a-25: / drang ba'i don ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:122a-26: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
T02TD2098E:122a-28: de bas ni kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122a-29: rgyal po ni bde bar gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:122a-31: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i man ngag go //
T02TD2098E:122a-32: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD2098E:122a-34: chos cha shas dang bcas par rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122a-35: don ma skyes par rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122a-36: sngags chos nyid lam du rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122a-37: bzod pa chos nyid du rig pa dus kyi tshe che ba ste /
T02TD2098E:122a-38: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:122a-39: de'i phrin las ni rig sngags la sogs pa'o ;
T02TD2098E:122a-40: / de kho na ma yin pa ni rdo rje rnon po zhes pas yid la mi byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122a-41: ral gri che zhes pas de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:122a-43: skye med bde ba'i snying po can ni mchog ste zhes pa de nyid kyang bcos par ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122a-44: rnam par dag pa ni snying rje chen po'i dam tshig go //
T02TD2098E:122b-0: @122b thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD2098E:122b-1: rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2098E:122b-3: gang la zung du 'jug pa gnas pa ni theg pa chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:122b-4: des nyer len gyi phung po lnga 'joms pa sdug bsngal gcod ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-5: mtshon cha chen po ni lam gyi bden pa ste /
T02TD2098E:122b-8: gzugs la rnam gsum shes bya ste //
T02TD2098E:122b-9: mchod pa byed pas mchod par bya //
T02TD2098E:122b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02TD2098E:122b-12: rdo rje zab mo ni thugs so //
T02TD2098E:122b-13: dzi na dzi ka ni sku ste /
T02TD2098E:122b-14: de gsum dbyer mi phyed pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-15: blo gros ni shes rab ste /
T02TD2098E:122b-16: don bzhin rig pa ni ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:122b-18: brtson chen zhes pa ni brtson 'grus chen po sgyu 'phrul dra bar rdzogs par mdzad de /
T02TD2098E:122b-20: bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud kun gyi rgyal po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyid ma yin la /
T02TD2098E:122b-21: de'i ched du brjod pa'i mchog 'dir ston pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD2098E:122b-22: / rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
T02TD2098E:122b-23: zhes pa ni gser dang gser bzhin nam /
T02TD2098E:122b-24: rgya mtsho chu bo 'bab pa bzhin rig par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-25: ye shes kyi sku ni ye shes sku rnams so //
T02TD2098E:122b-26: kun du bzang po dang blo gros bzang po ni 'jam dpal dang /
T02TD2098E:122b-27: sa'i snying po dang 'gro ba 'dzin ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:122b-28: de'i rnam par dag pa ni thabs du ma sprul pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-29: mtshan ma mi dmigs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122b-31: snying rje'i snying po can nyid kyis gsang ba chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-32: yang nas dang 'gro ba'i rten gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD2098E:122b-33: brten pa lha'i 'khor los mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa ni /
T02TD2098E:122b-35: rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-36: snying po che zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-37: de las thams cad du snang bas /
T02TD2098E:122b-40: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad lha'i 'khor lor snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-41: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / ces pa ni stong pa'o //
T02TD2098E:122b-42: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
T02TD2098E:122b-44: skye med chos te zhes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:122b-45: sna tshogs don zhes pa ni rang rang gi ngo bo ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-2: zhes pas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dbyer med bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-3: shes rab la sogs pa ni dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-4: de nyid 'dir rnal 'byor gyi lam du bya ba'i phyir mi g-yo zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon drug dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-5: rab tu dang ba'i bdag ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:123a-6: lam gyi lus kyi rnyog pa brgyad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-7: mngon sum pa zhes pa ni mngon sum pa 'dir rig pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-8: ji ltar na ye shes la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-9: de dag gis ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la bstod pa'o /
T02TD2098E:123a-11: // /'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dir bshad bar bya ste /
T02TD2098E:123a-12: 'dod pa ni mthun pa ste rab tu bstan pa'i 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-13: don ni bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:123a-15: grub pa ni ma chags pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-16: dam pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ser sna dag par byas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-17: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2098E:123a-19: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma chags pa'i dmyal ba sbyong bar byed do //
T02TD2098E:123a-20: byin pas yi dags sbyor bar byed do //
T02TD2098E:123a-21: re ba med pas byol song sbyong bar byed do //
T02TD2098E:123a-22: yang na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:123a-24: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces bya ste /
T02TD2098E:123a-25: gzhan gyi don la dmigs pas so //
T02TD2098E:123a-26: ji ltar na sems can thams cad sgrol ba zhes pa ni mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123a-28: bag la nyal ba la spyod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:123a-29: mos pa la spyod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:123a-30: las dang po pa rnams la gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2098E:123a-31: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02TD2098E:123a-34: nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123a-37: gcig pu kho na lhag pa'i dbye //
T02TD2098E:123a-39: mi shes pa ni gti mug go //
T02TD2098E:123a-40: dgra'i dregs pa ni bden pa gnyis med la the tshom za ba'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-41: de yang rig pa'i ye shes kyis 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123a-42: dpal ldan blo dang steg par ldan //
T02TD2098E:123a-44: dpal ni gzhung lugs kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
T02TD2098E:123a-45: blo ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i sa bon no //
T02TD2098E:123a-46: steg ni lhag pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2098E:123a-47: de rnams ro gcig tu skyes pa ni ldan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123b-0: de yang bla @123b ma'i brgyud thabs bsten pa dang /
T02TD2098E:123b-1: bsod nams las ni yang dag shes /
T02TD2098E:123b-3: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
T02TD2098E:123b-5: rtog pa la sems brtan pas 'khor ba bsdigs pa'i brda'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-6: lag pa brgyad po kun bskyad cing //
T02TD2098E:123b-8: phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gis /
T02TD2098E:123b-9: rtags dang thabs kyi bye brag dang /
T02TD2098E:123b-10: yul sna tshogs pa thams cad bde bar bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-11: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa yang de bzhin te /
T02TD2098E:123b-12: rtags la 'byung ba bzhi bde bas non pa dang /
T02TD2098E:123b-13: dga' ba bzhi don gyis lhan cig skyes pas gnon pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis gdan la reg par bzhengs so zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2098E:123b-15: des don kun du bsgrub pa'i phyir rkang mthe ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:123b-16: srid pa de nyid du byed par yang sbyang ro //
T02TD2098E:123b-17: don gcig ces pa la sogs pa ni 'brel pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123b-18: de yang don gnyis med ni gnyug ma'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-21: dam pa'i don de zhes pa ni ma bcos pa ste /
T02TD2098E:123b-22: 'khor bas 'jig pa med pa de ni mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-23: nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rig pa nyid las sna tshogs par snang ba gzugs la sogs pa'i don dang /
T02TD2098E:123b-24: gnyis su med pa myong bas na can zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-25: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ni thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:123b-26: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
T02TD2098E:123b-28: thams cad don dam pa byang chub kyi sems su ldan zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:123b-29: de bas bla ma mnyes pa las de'i bka' lung gis de lta bu'i rlung dbang po rnams la bkug ste /
T02TD2098E:123b-30: rgyun du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i bya ba byed pa'i rnal ma'i yid nyid du 'jog par byed do zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:123b-31: phyis zhen par mi 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2098E:123b-32: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
T02TD2098E:123b-34: nyams su myong ba'i phyir na des na sngon yongs su btang ba'i dbang po de yang yid dang bral bar byed pa med par 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:123b-35: mas bor ba'i be'u nyid rjes su 'chol ba bzhin du 'dir yang dbang po rnams yid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:123b-36: gang du yid 'jug pa der rab tu 'jug ste /
T02TD2098E:124a-1: rtogs par 'di dag rab tu sbyor bar med pa ma yin zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:124a-2: zung 'jug tu mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni /
T02TD2098E:124a-3: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
T02TD2098E:124a-5: srid par gyur pa ma yin pa ni //
T02TD2098E:124a-6: srid ba'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
T02TD2098E:124a-8: log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags te /
T02TD2098E:124a-9: brgyud thabs bsten pa nyid kyis 'dra bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2098E:124a-10: zangs las ra gan du gyur te /
T02TD2098E:124a-11: gser ma yin pa bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:124a-12: spangs pa ni spangs pa ste gser rnyed pa'i dus na sngar gyi 'dra ba la dgos pa med pa'o ;
T02TD2098E:124a-13: / bde ba dang bral ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:124a-14: srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba yin la /
T02TD2098E:124a-15: de la yang chen po pas dgos pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes ba nyid de /
T02TD2098E:124a-16: dper na nam mkha' la sprin nag po dang ser po la sogs pa bsal ba'i rjes sprin dkar yang dag pa'i dkar ba bzhin du dkar ba'i bde ba stong ba phra mo tsam mi gnas kyang bde bar 'thad de //
T02TD2098E:124a-18: ces pas zla ba dang 'od bzhin dag pa dang bde ba la tha mi dad par 'char ro //
T02TD2098E:124a-19: phyi'i sgro 'dogs chod pa'i dag pa'i 'char ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:124a-20: nang rten 'brel gyi dus na nyi ma 'char ka dang shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes so //
T02TD2098E:124a-21: des tha dad gyur pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:124a-22: mtshon par byed pa gcig gis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:124a-23: phyis rang rgyud du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:124a-24: 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las skyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pas //
T02TD2098E:124a-25: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag yongs su spangs nas bla na med pa'i longs spyod du nye bar 'gro zhing //
T02TD2098E:124a-26: 'gro ba 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2098E:124a-27: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis phog pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs bzhin du /
T02TD2098E:124a-28: 'gro ba rnams snying po med par snang ngo zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2098E:124a-29: sen mo 'od la sogs pa la phyi nang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2098E:124a-30: sngar bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba thams cad grags pa'i mtshan dpe la sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2098E:124a-31: de nyid rnam par dag pa bde ba la sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-0: de ltar na bde ba nyams su myong ba'i gnas bstan @124b pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:124b-1: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
T02TD2098E:124b-3: nor bu ni rin po che'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-5: chags pa ni thig le ste bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-6: dpal ni des gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-7: ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:124b-8: sangs rgyas ni shigs pa med pa'i ham ngo //
T02TD2098E:124b-9: sprul pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2098E:124b-11: mtshan nyid mi mthun pas mtshon par mi nus pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:124b-12: dad ldan zhes pas snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:124b-13: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
T02TD2098E:124b-15: phyi nang gi bye brag gis sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-16: ye shes mthong ba'i dus ni sa g-yos la sogs pa'i rtags 'byung bar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:124b-17: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
T02TD2098E:124b-19: sngar bzhin gyis kun rdzob kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa las /
T02TD2098E:124b-20: don gyi stobs chen po lnga dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2098E:124b-21: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
T02TD2098E:124b-23: sngar gyi bye brag gis dbang po dman pos mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor du bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-24: de las gzhan pas bde ba chen po'i dran pa 'chang ba po /
T02TD2098E:124b-25: dran pa bzhi po zhes pa ni sngar gyi bye brag gis tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-26: dus kyi ye shes dran pa dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-27: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-28: dus kyi ye shes snang bar dran pa'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-29: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-30: dus kyi ye shes sdugs sngal du dran pa'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-31: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-32: dus kyi ye shes bden par dran pa'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-33: ting nge 'dzin rgyal zhes pa ni sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis seng ge rnam par rtse ba dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-36: kun du snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-37: 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha sbyor ba la sogs pa'i yan lag brgyad do //
T02TD2098E:124b-38: byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis bdun dang rnam par shes pa'i bdun gyis lus rgyun gyis rtag pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:124b-39: me tog spos ni dngos dang ma bcos shing rang snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:124b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
T02TD2098E:124b-42: sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2098E:124b-43: yon tan mtsho ji snyed kyi gnas byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2098E:124b-44: lam gyi yan lag brgyad rig pa //
T02TD2098E:125a-1: bye brag gis de nyid dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang gis bdag dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-11: mthong ba po'i lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed cing rtag pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-16: mi dge ba kun nas bslang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-17: srid pa dang bral ba'i lta ba kun nas bslang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-18: srid pa dang bral bar bstan pas lta ba kun nas bslang ba dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-19: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125a-20: kun du rtog pa gang gis 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-22: gti mug gi kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba dang mthun par gang du mi rtog cing tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-23: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-25: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba dang mthun par kun du rtog pa 'di ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:125a-26: ngag gang gis bdag dang gzhan gdung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-27: nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-30: rigs pa dang bral bas yang dag pa'i ngag la 'dzud par byed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag go //
T02TD2098E:125a-31: las gang las kyang gang la rnam par smin pa yang gnag pa'i mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-32: las gang las kyang dkar ba rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba de mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125a-33: las gang las dkar ba yang rnam par smin pa gnag pa de mngon bar 'du mi byed cing /
T02TD2098E:125a-34: las gang las gnag kyang rnam par smin pa dkar na nag po zad de /
T02TD2098E:125a-35: dkar po'i phyogs 'phel bar byed cing /
T02TD2098E:125a-36: mngon par 'du byed cing dam pa'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
T02TD2098E:125a-37: gang la yang 'phags pa'i rigs pa can gyi sbyangs pa'i yon tan cung zad la gnas shing /
T02TD2098E:125a-38: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag la sogs pas 'tsho ba spangs te rang gi spyod pa'i ngang tshul rig pa dang ldan pas skye bo gzhan las rnyed kyang rung ste /
T02TD2098E:125a-39: cung zad tsam gyis ma gus shing /
T02TD2098E:125a-40: kha na ma thob med pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-0: 'phags pas rjes su @125b gnang ba'i 'tsho ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-1: rtsol ba gang gis bsags pa rjes su gnang ba'i 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-3: gti mug la sogs pa ston par mi byed cing /
T02TD2098E:125b-4: yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par zhugs te /
T02TD2098E:125b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dod pa bsten cing rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-6: gang du nye bar gnas na sku mi g-yo zhing 'khyogs pa ma yin par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2098E:125b-7: 'khor ba'i skyon rnams dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-8: lam yi yon tan rjes su dran zhing lam gyi mthar thug pa la yang dag par sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-9: de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par mdzad cing /
T02TD2098E:125b-10: mya ngan las 'das par brtan por gnon pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te zhes dgongs so //
T02TD2098E:125b-11: de nyid gcig tu byas pa'i ye shes ni /
T02TD2098E:125b-12: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
T02TD2098E:125b-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lam mo //
T02TD2098E:125b-15: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
T02TD2098E:125b-16: zhes pa ni sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-20: gnyis pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-21: de skye bar byed pa'i dbang la sogs pa gsum ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-22: nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
T02TD2098E:125b-24: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-25: sems can gyi yul mi snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-26: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:125b-27: ye shes kyi snying po can du bstan cing /
T02TD2098E:125b-28: de gsal bar mdzad pa por yang 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-29: sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
T02TD2098E:125b-31: sngar bshad pa dang byang chub la myur ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-33: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
T02TD2098E:125b-39: sems lhan cig askyes pa shes par myong ba'o //
T02TD2098E:125b-41: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
T02TD2098E:125b-43: gdul bya'i dbang po la mi bzad pa'i gzugs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2098E:125b-44: yid rnam par dag nas lhan cig skyes par gyur pa la 'phrog ces bya ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-0: phung po lnga don de nyid shes @126a * //
T02TD2098E:126a-2: ji ltar ston pa bstan pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-3: rigs lnga dang zag pa med pa'i phung po lngar shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-4: de kho na nyid du dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126a-6: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
T02TD2098E:126a-7: zhes pa ni gnyi ga la'o //
T02TD2098E:126a-8: nges 'byung kun ni theg pa gsum ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-9: mtha' la gnas pa ni sa gnyis so //
T02TD2098E:126a-10: gzhan spangs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126a-11: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
T02TD2098E:126a-13: des 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
T02TD2098E:126a-14: zhes pas theg pa gsum gyi lam la rim gyis sbyangs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-15: gnas zhes pas ldan pa ste skye ba rim pa bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:126a-16: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
T02TD2098E:126a-17: zhes pa de ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:126a-18: yan lag la sogs pas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-19: yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126a-20: srid rtsa bton pa ni dus kyi gsum pas byin rlabs thob pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-21: lam gyi gsum pa rten med pa las thos pas sa bon gyi bag chags dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-22: mngon du rgyu rtsa ba nas bton pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126a-23: phyis de ltar mi 'gyur ba ni ;
T02TD2098E:126a-24: / dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
T02TD2098E:126a-26: skye mched bcu gnyis rang gi ngo bo dag pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-27: de yang mig ces bya ba ni stong pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126a-28: dbus na rnam shes ji ltar mchis //
T02TD2098E:126a-29: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02TD2098E:126a-30: de ltar na gzugs ma mchis pas lta ba ma mchis so zhes pas so //
T02TD2098E:126a-31: srid pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126a-32: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can zhes pas /
T02TD2098E:126a-33: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ye shes su shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-34: kun 'byung bde bar sad pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-36: lam 'bras bu rang chas su ldan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126a-37: nyan thos dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126a-38: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
T02TD2098E:126a-39: zhes pas brgyad la zad pa shes pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126a-40: mi skye ba shes pas khyab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:126a-42: man ngag gi drin yin pas bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:126a-43: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
T02TD2098E:126a-45: bden pa bzhi'i tshul gsum dga' ba bzhir rab tu ldan pas so //
T02TD2098E:126a-46: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:126a-47: 'di dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya las rig par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2098E:126a-48: dga' ba nyid bye brag gi don gyis bcu drug tu 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2098E:126a-49: dga' ba nyid bcu drug 'gyur du bshad de /
T02TD2098E:126a-51: ye shes sems dpa' 'dzin pa'i bdag / bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02TD2098E:126a-52: zhes gsungs pa'i don gyis so //
T02TD2098E:126b-0: rnam @126b pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
T02TD2098E:126b-2: sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis /
T02TD2098E:126b-3: ji ltar sa gser zla ba me //
T02TD2098E:126b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126b-5: de nyid rnam par dag pa'i rigs lnga dang /
T02TD2098E:126b-8: ye shes lnga dang dbyer mi phyed par gyur pas /
T02TD2098E:126b-12: dug lnga rang bzhin gyis zhi bar gyur pa la bya ste /
T02TD2098E:126b-13: de yang sa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126b-14: sa phyogs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-15: de'i phyir rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes rig pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126b-16: mchog ces gsungs pa ni rang gi don te /
T02TD2098E:126b-17: sangs rgyas dang chos la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don to //
T02TD2098E:126b-18: da ni skad cig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2098E:126b-19: skad cig ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-20: thams cad ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:126b-21: mngon par rtogs pa ni the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-22: de yang ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa ni sems kyi zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126b-23: rang gi rang bzhin du bstan pa ni kyi zhes bya /
T02TD2098E:126b-24: de skad cig gi dus dmigs pa na /
T02TD2098E:126b-25: dga' ba sna tshogs nyid du brjod //
T02TD2098E:126b-26: mchog dga' rnam par smin pa nyid //
T02TD2098E:126b-27: dga' bral rnam pa med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:126b-28: lhan cig dga' ba mtshan nyid bral /
T02TD2098E:126b-30: don kun rig ces pa ni /
T02TD2098E:126b-31: gzhan mi dmigs par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-32: 'gro ba la gdod ma nas bstan par rig pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126b-33: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
T02TD2098E:126b-34: 'gro ba 'don par mdzad pa yin gyis don la rtogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir te bshad zin to //
T02TD2098E:126b-35: gong ma la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126b-36: smon lam gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad la /
T02TD2098E:126b-37: des go rims bstan pa'i phyir theg pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2098E:126b-38: theg pa bzhi po yod par ni ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:126b-39: gcig nyid khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-40: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bag chags kyi sa bon mi gnas par ston te /
T02TD2098E:126b-42: khams rnams zhes pa ni bco brgyad do //
T02TD2098E:126b-43: dag pa'i bdag ces pa ni rang bzhin gyis lus su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-44: las kyi khams rnams zhes pa ni gsum ste zad par byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:126b-45: chu'i rgya mtsho ni 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2098E:126b-50: de yang sbyor ba ni nang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-1: dben pa thob pa'i dgon pa las 'bras bu 'byung bas na /
T02TD2098E:127a-2: theg pa'i bye brag bla na med pa la dgos pa yod do //
T02TD2098E:127a-3: bag chags dang rjes su mthun par sa bon bral ba ni ma rig pa dang /
T02TD2098E:127a-5: len pa la nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-7: 'du byed la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-14: rga shi ni kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2098E:127a-15: gtan spangs pa ni dug sngags kyis btul bas dug tu mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02TD2098E:127a-16: bde ba chen po'i thabs kho nar gyur pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:127a-17: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs /
T02TD2098E:127a-20: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02TD2098E:127a-22: de yang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i don dang /
T02TD2098E:127a-23: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i don dang /
T02TD2098E:127a-24: gzugs kyi khams kyi don dang /
T02TD2098E:127a-25: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi don spong bas na /
T02TD2098E:127a-26: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
T02TD2098E:127a-27: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:127a-28: rnam shes ni rnam shes mtha' yas la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2098E:127a-29: gzugs med pa'i skye gnas kyi don ni 'gog par byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-30: gang gi don byed pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:127a-31: sems can kun gyi yul dang ldan //
T02TD2098E:127a-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs sems can gyi rigs par nus so //
