T02TD2098E:127a-36: dpe nye bar grub pa ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:127a-37: sem can kun gyi yid la gdong ma nas sangs rgyas kyi thugs gnas par sems can de dag gi sems dag dang /
T02TD2098E:127a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi rang bzhin gcig pas mthun par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-39: gzhan gyi don gyis 'gyur ba ma yin te //
T02TD2098E:127a-40: sems can gyi yid tshim par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:127a-41: de bas na sems can kun gyi yid tshim par byed pa ste /
T02TD2098E:127a-42: rnam rtog zad par byed pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-43: de tsam du ma zad kyi /
T02TD2098E:127a-44: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //
T02TD2098E:127a-45: zhes pas lhan cig skyes pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-46: gtan la phab pa'i yid med pas grub pa'i mthar phyin 'khrul ba med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127a-47: nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2098E:127a-49: don ji lta ba la blo ji lta ba bzhin zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-0: don gsum ni 'das pa @127b dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-1: da ltar byung ba gsum du'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-2: the tshom med pa'i blo zhes pa ni rgyun gcig par ro //
T02TD2098E:127b-3: kun don ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba kun gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-5: yon tan gsum gyi bdag ces bya ste /
T02TD2098E:127b-6: rdul mun pa snying stobs gsum yang 'gro ba'i don du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-7: nyan thos la phung po dang don gsum dub dag med par ston pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-9: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
T02TD2098E:127b-11: rgyu'i dus su dge ba'i chos tshol ba dang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa thams cad shes rab kyis so sor rig pas so //
T02TD2098E:127b-12: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2098E:127b-13: zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i dus na zad pa'i ye shes dang //
T02TD2098E:127b-14: mi skye ba'i ye shes thob par ston to //
T02TD2098E:127b-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i rkyen ni du ma yin la /
T02TD2098E:127b-17: nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni gcig kho nas //
T02TD2098E:127b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
T02TD2098E:127b-19: zhes pas rgyu 'bras rje su mthun pas thams cad gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:127b-20: lus mi 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:127b-21: lus med ces pas rnam par smin pa'i lus med ces ni chos kyi sku can no //
T02TD2098E:127b-22: lus kyi mchog ces pas ye shes kyi phung po can du snang ba'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-23: du ma dang sna tshogs 'byung ba ni lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:127b-24: de bas na gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-25: ji ltar 'gyur ba ni nor bu rin chen ltar ro //
T02TD2098E:127b-27: rin chen rtog ces pas khams gsum gyi rgyal mtshan ni //
T02TD2098E:127b-28: de dag gis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:127b-29: da ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsdus te bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:127b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs pa dang mkhyen pa dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-31: mngon du mdzad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gsum dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-32: bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po ste /
T02TD2098E:127b-33: bya ba nan tan de bzhin du 'dir yang sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyud gcig tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-34: thams cad sems kyi khyad par du shes par bya ba dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-35: 'bad pa med pa rang gi rang gis 'byung ba la mngon du byung ba ni bla na med pa ste /
T02TD2098E:127b-36: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02TD2098E:127b-37: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:127b-38: gsang sngags 'chang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:127b-39: de yang ye shes nyid dang /
T02TD2098E:127b-46: tshogs rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i gsang sngags 'byung bas skye gnas so //
T02TD2098E:128a-0: yi ge med ces pa ni de nyi gdong ma'i @128a * //
T02TD2098E:128a-1: gnas su thim pas spros pa las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-2: de nyid mtshan par byed pa ni yi ge ste /
T02TD2098E:128a-4: de la gsang sngags chen po zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2098E:128a-5: sku gsung thugs kyi rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2098E:128a-7: drug tu 'gyur zhing gsang sngags kyi don mchog dang thun mngon dos grub don kun skyed pa por byed pa ni bya ba nan tan no //
T02TD2098E:128a-8: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs gnyis su bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:128a-9: thig le chen po zhes bya ste /
T02TD2098E:128a-11: de yang bde ba chen po'i rigs gcig tu bya ba'i yi ge med ces bya'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-12: de nyid yi ge sna tshogs su snang bas stobs po che zhes bya'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-16: thig le rang gi sa bon te /
T02TD2098E:128a-18: stong pa ni rig par 'dzin pa med par ro //
T02TD2098E:128a-19: yi ge brgya zhes pa ni phyogs gcig mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi /
T02TD2098E:128a-20: ri rab kyi rdul phra rab rnyed du yang 'gyur la /
T02TD2098E:128a-21: yon tan yang de snyed du 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2098E:128a-22: don sngar bshad pa'i yi ge drug gi rang bzhin du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-23: rnam pa kun ldan ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-24: rnam pa med pa de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par ro //
T02TD2098E:128a-25: bcu drug gi dbyangs yi go //
T02TD2098E:128a-26: phyed ni grong khyer dkrugs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-28: thig le ni rdo rje 'chang dang mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-30: yan lag med pa ni phyi rol gyi rdzas dgag pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-32: de las 'das pa ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-33: bsam gtan bzhi ni dga' ba dang /
T02TD2098E:128a-36: dran pa ste dga' ba la sogs pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:128a-37: rtse mo can ni ro gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD2098E:128a-38: 'jig rten par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2098E:128a-39: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02TD2098E:128a-44: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD2098E:128a-46: dga' ba med pa'i btang snyoms dang /
T02TD2098E:128a-47: dran pa yang dag par brjod pa ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-49: bde ba med pa btang snyoms kyi dran pa yongs su dag pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128a-50: mkhyen pas don yod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs du ma dang /
T02TD2098E:128a-51: gang zag gi rgyud du ma rig pas rtse gcig bsgom pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i mchog la dbyugs dbyung gnyis lhag par ston te //
T02TD2098E:128a-52: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni gang zag go //
T02TD2098E:128b-0: lus kyi @128b mchog ni chos sku'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-1: de nyid ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2098E:128b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs par snang ngo //
T02TD2098E:128b-4: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02TD2098E:128b-6: lha'i dbang po ni khyab 'jug go //
T02TD2098E:128b-8: lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no //
T02TD2098E:128b-9: lha ma yin gyi bdag po ni r'a hu la'o//
T02TD2098E:128b-10: 'chi med dbang po ni nye dbang ngo //
T02TD2098E:128b-11: lha'i bla ma ni phur bu'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-12: 'joms byed ni thags bzangs ris so //
T02TD2098E:128b-13: gnyis pa ni srin po'i bdag po'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-14: dbang phyug ni ma h'a de ba ste /
T02TD2098E:128b-15: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'i rang rang gi rgyal por bstod pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-16: de bas sems can thams cad sred pa'i dgon pa las rgal bar mdzad pa ni ston pa gcig pu ste /
T02TD2098E:128b-17: de bas na 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-18: de ltar gyur par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-19: dgongs pa ji lta bu mnga' ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2098E:128b-20: byams pa'i go chas chas pa ste //
T02TD2098E:128b-21: zhes pa ni phyogs med pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-22: snying rje yi ni ya la dab gos //
T02TD2098E:128b-23: zhes pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed ba ste bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-24: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02TD2098E:128b-25: zhes pa ni rtags dang don te shes rab dang rigs pas nang dang /
T02TD2098E:128b-26: phyi'i sgro 'dogs mi mnga' ba dang kha sbyor snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-27: mi shes pa ni gti mug go //
T02TD2098E:128b-28: g-yul ngo ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i dus so //
T02TD2098E:128b-29: sel ba ni dag par mdzad pa'o//
T02TD2098E:128b-30: dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2098E:128b-33: bdud 'dul ba ni btul ba ste rdo rje gdan la'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-34: de'i mthu ni bdud bzhi la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-35: mchod pa'i 'os su bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:128b-39: khyod nyid thams cad du 'khrul zhing rim gyis dbang po'i bye brag dang mthun par bstan pa khyod nyid du ma gyur pa dang /
T02TD2098E:128b-40: mi 'gyur ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2098E:128b-41: de bas na 'di dag la gnyis sbyar te /
T02TD2098E:128b-43: gzhan pa yang mchod 'os ni thos pa dang dran pa mthar phyin pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-44: bstod 'os ni rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-45: phyag gi gnas ni thams cad kyi skye gnas su gyur pas so //
T02TD2098E:128b-46: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os ni theg pa gsum gyi rang rang gi lam rgyud la sbyangs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:128b-47: bkur 'os ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste /
T02TD2098E:129a-0: brjod par bya ba'i mchog ni theg pa chen po pa rnams @129a * //
T02TD2098E:129a-1: kyi ste rang bzhin gyis don phun sum tshogs pa snang bas so //
T02TD2098E:129a-2: phyag bya ba'i 'os ni sngags spyod pa rnams kyi ste rang rig ston pas so //
T02TD2098E:129a-3: bla ma'i rab ni dbang thob pa rnams kyi ste /
T02TD2098E:129a-4: de kho na nyid mthong ba dang /
T02TD2098E:129a-5: chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas so //
T02TD2098E:129a-6: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes thugs su chud pa'i rdzu phrul gyis 'jig rten la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-7: gsum rig ni dus mkhyen pa /
T02TD2098E:129a-8: mchod pa mkhyen pa dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid mkhyen pa yin la /
T02TD2098E:129a-10: zhes bya ba ni mi slu zhing rig pa la the tshom mi mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-11: mngon shes drug ldan ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-12: rjes dran drug ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang yi dam dang tshig dran pa mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-13: byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa gzhan gyi yab tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-14: sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po'i yang yab a'i //
T02TD2098E:129a-15: sngags pa zu 'phrul chen po ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-16: 'jig rten 'das pa'i la sogs pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-17: mjug bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2098E:129a-18: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02TD2098E:129a-20: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02TD2098E:129a-22: rigs phyag rgya bzhi ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-23: rtags phyag rgya bzhi ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus so'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-24: don phyag rgya bzhi ni lam gyi dus su'o //
T02TD2098E:129a-25: nyes mchis gyur pa la sogs bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2098E:129a-26: shes rab yul ni mtha' dang bral //
T02TD2098E:129a-27: zab mo'i don ni gzhal dka' bas //
T02TD2098E:129a-28: gzhal bya 'jal byed kyis stong pa'i //
T02TD2098E:129a-29: 'gro kun snying po len par shog / sngags pa rnal 'byor la mi mkhas //
T02TD2098E:129a-30: phal cher bag med lam 'gro la //
T02TD2098E:129a-31: snying po mngon rtogs 'di brjod pas //
T02TD2098E:129a-33: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2098E:129a-34: don ni ngo bor 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2098E:129a-35: slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2098E:129a-37: // / rnal 'byor pa chen po pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o /
